Iŋgoŋ hidi yadi unduŋ mu taneeŋ. Me nediyeŋ loloŋnit hatibe nadiwaak adi yadi timeŋ fofoŋnit hatiluwaak. Kaŋ me talitimeŋ adi undugoŋ tipilapilaye-me wele hatiŋa hehitubulodaluwaak.
Hidi nanimbu nadiwit, neeŋdi me loloŋnit? Me kweliŋgoŋ ila nanaŋ hogok tibek u be, be me nanaŋe kidila timiŋa bek? Me kweliŋgoŋ ila nanaŋ hogok tibek adi me loloŋnit, uŋakoŋ. Kuŋgoŋ nu adi hidi’walaŋ lekiŋgoŋhik gineŋ tipilapilaye-mehik hatilat.
Tikamanda mintanamguk hogohogok u hidi mu binabugiŋ, wanaŋ hatine mintanamguk.
Nu batnedi kwet i kadokodok nanindapmaguk, undugoŋ nubo kwet i kadokoneeŋdok hanindapmalat.
Unduŋ dokti nu yotnekwetneneŋ nanaŋe ime noŋgoŋ naneem, tiŋa hidi mapme’walaŋ kumopop foloŋ ila Isilaehi metam bop 12 hatiiŋ hogohogok u yabudokoneeŋ.”
“Saimon, indiŋ nadiweŋ, Sadaŋ adi nadisukilitihik mahamule tiulidoko tilak, ala kopi utnene gitnem niŋ wiiŋ kaŋ folooŋ niŋ wiiŋ unduŋ dabugoŋ hehidanewe yoŋak.
Kuŋgoŋ nu du gehitubu-lodaaŋ nadisukilitigedi mu gweyehewekdok ninadi kwanai agaŋ tiŋat. Unduŋ doktiŋa nu’walaŋkade udaneeŋ buŋa nokeye saŋiniŋ yemiŋa yehitubu-kilitibaaŋ.”
Kaŋ Pitadibo niŋguk “Wapum, nu dukut noŋgoŋ yot fafaŋeniŋneŋ fofoŋdok be kumuŋ titiŋdok u kedem nadilat.”
Kaŋ Jesudibo yoguk, “Pita, indiŋ ganimbe nadiweŋ. Kamiŋ timiŋ yendok pupupdi mu kutilune du nu mu nadinamulaŋ nai lufomkulitniŋ yobeŋ.”
Unduŋ yoŋa Jesudi mihiŋiye indiŋ yeninadiguk, “Koom haniŋkule muneeŋ be lihik be kayoŋnamokop mokit ugiŋ nai uŋaniŋ nemek nolidok lohilohi neeŋbe tigiŋ?” Kaŋ adibo yogiŋ, “Mokoŋ.”
Kaŋ Jesudibo indiŋ yeniŋguk, “Kamiŋ adi nebek niŋ muneeŋ be likŋiŋnit kaŋ u maaŋ moŋgolek. Kaŋ me nediyeŋ miknoŋŋiŋ moŋ kaŋ dahidahiŋiŋ me nolidok yembune tuwaune muneeŋ u moŋgola miknoŋŋiŋ tuwawek.
Yodoko Mededi indiŋ yolak doktiŋa hanimbe nadineŋ, ‘Adi me kadakaniŋ titiŋ nindapmaneŋ.’ U biyagoŋ hinek nu’walaŋ mintawek. Biyagoŋ hinek nemenemek Yodoko Mededi nutok yolak u agaŋ biyagoŋ mintawek.”
Kaŋ adibo yogiŋ, “Wapum, i kaweŋ indi miknoŋnik lufomuk.” Kaŋ adibo yeniŋguk, “U tuwot.”
Unduŋ tiŋa Jesu yokwet wapum bikabuŋa fooŋ wooŋ feŋ tuluguk unduŋ Oliwa Tuwai foloŋ loune mihiŋiye maaŋ kelegiŋ.
Wosuwaaŋ yeniŋguk, “Tigene tikamanda gineŋ gweheyeeŋ maneeneŋ doktiŋa ninadi kwanai tineŋ.”
Unduŋ yeniŋa ne kabe-kweetniŋ kawade kutne wooŋ maiŋ wendok tuwot wooŋ mulelem tiŋa ninadi kwanai tuguk.
Indiŋ ninadiguk, “Me baŋ, du nadiune tuwot tubune kaŋ folofigita i nolomtibeŋ. Iŋgoŋ nu yolat wondokti moŋ, da nadilaŋ unduŋ tibeŋ.”
Unduŋ yolune kunum gineniŋ aŋelo niŋ fooŋ saŋiniŋ miŋguk.
Kaŋ Jesu adi nadimalabuda tiŋa ninadi kwanai gibita tulune mimindiŋiŋ adi naŋgat dabugoŋ kwetfoloŋ hadokomaguk.
Adi ninadi kwanai tubudapmaaŋ pilali mihiŋiye yabe uguk, wooŋ yabulu adi damo deihakiŋ. Adi welebulagitdi yehitubu-gweheyeune deihakiŋ
kaŋ yeniŋguk, “Maŋgoŋde damo kwanai hogok tiiŋ? Hidi tikamanda gineŋ gweheyeeŋ maneeneŋ ale pilali ninadi kwanai tineŋ.”
Jesu adi mede hayenilu metam bop wapum busuwagiŋ. Mihiŋiye 12’walaaniŋneŋ me niŋ wou Judasdi talitimeŋ tiyemguk. Adi Jesu siŋgoŋgome tibe loune
Jesudi indiŋ niŋguk, “Judas, dagoŋ hinek Me Kobumuŋ siŋgoŋgomeeŋ memik kohohik foloŋ kamelaŋ.”
Jesu mihiŋiye ne gut hakiŋ adi nemek u mintawe tubune kaŋ yogiŋ, “Wapum, kedem be indi miknoŋdi widihinim?”
Kaŋ mewoi lekiŋgoŋhik gineŋ me niŋdi Siloŋyot diniŋ talitimeŋ wapum’walaŋ tipilapilaye-meŋiŋ magi didimeniŋneŋkade filodiguk.
Kaŋ Jesudi yeniŋguk, “Hidi unduŋ mu tineŋ.” Unduŋ yeniŋa kohoŋ me weŋ magi foloŋ kameune magi kotigoŋ utumbaguk.
Kaŋ Jesudi Siloŋyot diniŋ talitimeŋ heki eŋ Siloŋyot kadoko diniŋ me wapuhi eŋ talitimeŋ heki honene bugiŋ adi indiŋ yeniŋguk, “Hidi nu mikbe tubupilale tilat doktiŋa miknoŋ eŋ tebe bohom tiŋa nohonene buŋit?
Nu helemahelemaŋ hidigut Siloŋyotneŋ hatilat, kaŋ nai uŋaniŋ maŋgoŋde mu nohoneiŋ? Kuŋgoŋ kamiŋ adi mambip molom’walaŋ saŋiniŋdi fafaŋe hinek tilak doktiŋa hidi’walaŋ nai tilak.”
Unduŋ yodapmaune honeeŋ nagila Siloŋyot diniŋ Talitimeŋ Wapum’walaŋ yolineŋ ugiŋ. Kaŋ Pita adi gikiŋgoŋ yali yayabukuwali uguk.
Wosuwaaŋ yot maaneŋ fooŋ wooŋ gimbahaŋ maaneŋ kudup heu daune ikiŋ, kaŋ Pitadi metam uŋoŋ ikiŋ u yehitomboyoula ikiŋ.
Kaŋ tipilapilaye tamkuya niŋdi kudup dahauta tugukneŋ uŋgoŋ ila kakiyondaaŋ yoguk, “Me yoŋ adi Jesu gut noŋgoŋ hatilak.”
Unduŋ yoguk kaŋ Pitadibo niŋguk, “Nu me u mu nadimilat.”
Muniniŋ ila me niŋdibo Pita kakiyondaaŋ niŋguk, “Nohik niŋ du iŋakoŋ.” Unduŋ yoguk kaŋ Pitadi niŋguk, “Nu mokoŋ.”
Kaŋ kabe-yagigigoŋ ila kotigoŋ me niŋdibo fafaŋeŋgoŋ indiŋ niŋguk, “Biyagoŋ hinek, me yoŋ adi Galiliniŋ. Adigut iŋgoŋ hatilak.”
Unduŋ yobu Pitadi indiŋ yoguk, “Nu me u yolaŋ u biyaku mu nadimilat.” Unduŋ ila yolu nai uŋaniŋgoŋ pupup kutiguk.
Kaŋ Wapumdi fakaleeŋ Pita didimeŋgoŋ hinek kaguk. Kaŋ Pita adi wapumdi mede indiŋ niŋguk u naditomguk. “Pupupdi mu kutilune du nu mu nadinamulaŋ nai lufomkulitniŋ yobeŋ,”
niŋguk u naditomuŋa fakaŋ fowooŋ makat gibitaŋ kokuk.
Kaŋ me Jesu honeeŋ kadokogiŋ hekidi nimpekit tiŋa ukiŋ.
Tiŋa namanda hauledi folokenehep tiŋa indiŋ ninadigiŋ, “Du polofet biyagoŋ nobu hatiliweŋ kaŋ nebek gutak u kedem ninimbu nadinim.”
Unduŋ tiŋa mede kadakahi fee noli maaŋ niŋgiŋ.
Unduŋ hati tulune helehautaune Siloŋyot diniŋ talitimeŋ wapuhi tiŋa Judahi’walaŋ me wapuhi eŋ Yodoko Mede hinale heki buŋa bopnegiŋ. Kaŋ Jesu nagila bophik gineŋ loune niŋgiŋ,
“Du Kilisto nobu kaŋ ninimbeŋ?” Ninadigiŋ kaŋ adibo yeniŋguk, “Nu hanimbe hidi medene tuwot mu nadineŋ.
Be hidi kibi nu haninadi tibit u tuwot mu yoneŋ.
Iŋgoŋ Me Kobumuŋ adi kamiŋ tububihila Bepaŋ Saŋiniŋ Molom kohoŋ didimeniŋneŋkade ila wooŋ ilaak.”
Unduŋ yeniŋguk kaŋ adi wanakaŋ indiŋ niŋgiŋ, “Unduŋ doktiŋa du Bepaŋ mihiŋiŋ kube?” Niŋgiŋ kaŋ adibo yeniŋguk, “Hide yoiŋ uŋakoŋ, nu adigoŋ.”
Unduŋ yobune adibo yogiŋ, “Indi inde agaŋ ne’walaŋ maŋiŋ gineŋ mintaune nadiyam doktiŋa kotigoŋ aditok mede mu yodok.”
Unduŋ yoŋa noŋgoŋ piladapmaaŋ Jesu nagila Pailat’walaŋ logiŋ.
Looŋ mede gineŋ kameeŋ indiŋ niŋgiŋ, “Me yoŋ adi indi’walaŋ metamniye talik moiniŋ yanagitak, tiŋa Lomahi’walaŋ gapmandok muneeŋ mu mimiŋdok yoŋa kamehep tiyemulak. Tiŋa netok adi Kilisto, Mapme yolak.”
Unduŋ yogiŋ kaŋ Pailatdibo ninadiguk, “Judahi’walaŋ me mapme du-ku be?” Kaŋ Jesudibo niŋguk, “Yolaŋ uŋakoŋ.”
Yobune Pailatdibo Siloŋyot diniŋ me wapuhi eŋ metam bop wapum u indiŋ yeniŋguk, “Nu me yeŋ’walaŋ kadakaniŋŋiŋ nemu kalat.”
Unduŋ yeniŋguk iŋgoŋ adi fafaŋeŋgoŋ indiŋ yogiŋ, “Adi Galili kwetneŋ gwaŋ tububihila metam nadinadihik tubugiyonda tiŋa buŋak, bu i busuwalak.”
Pailat adi u nadiŋa yeninadiguk, “Me i Galiliniŋ be?”
Unduŋ yeninadiguk kaŋ adibo indiŋ yogiŋ, “Jesu adi Helotdi kwet diki kadokolak uŋaniŋ.” Unduŋ yobune nadiŋa kameune Helot’walaŋ uguk. Nai uŋaniŋ Helot adi maaŋ Jelusalem uŋgoŋ hakuk.
Helot adi gigitŋiŋ nadiŋa kakaŋdok koomgoŋ hatinadiluguk. Unduŋ doktiŋa adi Jesu kaŋ nadifo tuguk. Tiŋa undugoŋ kudi niŋ tubune kakaŋdok yoŋa hatiguk.
Unduŋ doktiŋa Helotdi ninadi fee tuguk, iŋgoŋ Jesudi kibi nemu tubu-udanemiŋguk.
Kaŋ Siloŋyot diniŋ talitimeŋ wapuhi eŋ Yodoko Mede hinale hekidi yamaiŋgoŋ uyeŋ yali niŋgigine tigiŋ.
Kaŋ Helot tiŋa mikmeŋiye adi Jesu tihilihili timiŋa nimpekit tigiŋ. Untiŋa mapme diniŋ dahidahi fofooŋ niŋ tiŋa dahimiŋa niŋkulu kotigoŋ Pailat’walaŋ uguk.
Helot adi koom Pailat memik timiluguk, iŋgoŋ nai uŋaniŋ menot tugumuk.
Pailatdi me Siloŋyot diniŋ talitimeŋ eŋ me wapuhi tiŋa metam hogohogok wanakaŋ katiyenimbu buŋa bopneune
yeniŋguk, “Hidi me i metam yeniŋgalika tiŋa talik moiŋ yanagitak yoŋa nagila nu’walaŋ buŋit. Kaŋ nu hidi namandahik foloŋ hinek mede yendok ninadiŋat, iŋgoŋ mede folooŋ nemu tubumintaŋat kaŋ hidi me i mede foloŋ kamefit tiiŋ.
Helotdi maaŋ mede moŋ lohikaaŋ koti kameune indi’walaŋkade buŋak. Me i kadakaniŋŋiŋ nemoŋ doktiŋa indi ulukumuŋfit tuwot mu tinim.
Unduŋ doktiŋa hogok wihitnadiŋa kamewe wek.” Adi’walaŋ uŋoŋ talik indiŋ hatuguk. Gulet indigoŋ Pailatdi me yot fafaŋeniŋneŋ hakagiŋ u kubugoŋ kubugoŋ yenindapmaune fooŋ wagiŋ.
Unduŋ doktiŋa metam hogohogokdi kakaliŋa indiŋ yogiŋ, “Me u ulukumuŋa Balabas bikabu bek.”
Balabas adi gapman gut mik tiŋa me niŋ ulukumuŋguk kaŋ nagila yot fafaŋeniŋneŋ kamegiŋ.
Unduŋ tiŋa Pailatdi kotigoŋ Jesu bikabune uuŋdok yeniŋguk.
Iŋgoŋ adi kakaliŋa yogiŋ, “Koloŋdabek foloŋ kumumbek! Koloŋdabek foloŋ kumumbek!”
Yobune Pailatdi kotigoŋ indiŋ yeniŋguk, “Me i maŋgoŋ yom hinek tiŋak? Nu yomŋiŋ nemu kaŋat ale maŋgoŋde ulukumuŋfit tinim. Unduŋ doktiŋa wihitnadi hogok tiŋa kamewe wek.”
Unduŋ yeniŋguk iŋgoŋ metam adi gigine tiŋa Jesu koloŋdabek foloŋ uutdok yogiŋ.
Tiŋa kakalihikdi Pailat’walaŋ medeŋiŋ ulatifoguk. Untubu wabiŋa Pailatdi medehik keleeŋ undugoŋ mintawek yodapmaguk.
Kaŋ metam’walaŋ medehik keleeŋ Balabas bikabuyemiŋa Jesu mikme kohohik foloŋ kameguk.
Mikme heki Jesu nagila ugiŋ. Uŋila talipmeŋ me niŋ tubumintagiŋ, wou Saimon, adi Sailini yokwetneŋniŋ, ala kobugoŋ buŋa yokwet wapumneŋ fowe buguk. Kaŋ honeeŋ Jesu’walaŋ koloŋdabek u kaluwaŋŋiŋ foloŋ kameeŋ niŋgigineune bemŋa Jesu keleguk.
Metam bop wapumdi kelegiŋ, kaŋ adi lekiŋgoŋhik gineŋ tamwoi noli adi kabulagitaaŋ makat kola keletaugiŋ.
Kaŋ Jesudi udaneeŋ indiŋ yeniŋguk, “Jelusalemhi tamwoi, hidi nutok mu kotneŋ, hidetok eŋ wapmihihiyedok nadi kotneŋ.
Nadiiŋ be. Hatigene nai niŋ dulaune metamdi indiŋ yoneeŋ, ‘Tamwoi wapmihi mu yanagikiŋ hidi kedem nadifo tineŋ.’
Nai uŋaniŋ metamdi kweboboe heki indiŋ yenineeŋ, ‘Golooŋ fooŋ nihikufulaneŋ.’
Nemek indiniŋ adi bem kaipmuŋ gineŋ tiiŋ, iŋgoŋ kumuŋ gineŋ adi dediŋ timineŋ?”
Me kadakaniŋ titiŋ yakat lufomuk adi maaŋ Jesu dut kumuŋdok yoŋa yanagila ugiŋ.
Wooŋ kwet wou niŋ Me Mebi Kitili, uŋoŋ wooŋ Jesu koloŋdabek foloŋ ukiŋ. Me kadakaniŋ titiŋ yakat adi maaŋ koloŋdabek foloŋ widihigiŋ, noli kohoŋ didimeniŋneŋkade ukambiyakiŋ eŋ noli kohoŋ kapmadineŋkade ukambiyakiŋ.
Kaŋ Jesudi indiŋ yoguk, “Me baŋ, adi nemek tiiŋ u mebi mu nadidakaleeŋ tiiŋ doktiŋa kadakaniŋhik u biyembeŋ.” Kaŋ mikme heki adi kat kula dahidahiŋiŋ nehitok daneeŋ moŋgokiŋ.
Memetam uŋgoŋ yakalu Judahi me wapuhidi nimpekit tiŋa indiŋ yogiŋ, “Metam noli adi kedem yehitubu-lodalak, tiŋa adi Kilisto, Bepaŋ mihiŋiŋ biyagoŋ nobu hatiliwek kaŋ nebo tubulodawek.”
Unduŋ yogiŋ kaŋ mikme hekidi maaŋ yamaiŋgoŋ labuŋa nimpekit tiŋa wain ime buukaaŋ u sumulimimbu loune niŋgiŋ,
“Du Judahi’walaŋ mapme biyagoŋ nobu hatiliweŋ kaŋ du da uŋgoŋ folooge tubulodaweŋ.”
Kudi niŋ koloŋdabek ki foloŋ indiŋ youla ukambiyakiŋ, “Me yoŋ adi Judahi’walaŋ Mapme.”
Kaŋ meyat koloŋdabek foloŋ yakumuk adi’walaaniŋ me niŋdi Jesu niŋfoko tiŋa indiŋ yoguk, “Du Kilisto biyagoŋ nobu kaŋ da folooge tubulodaaŋ indi maaŋ nihitubu-lodaweŋ.”
Unduŋ yoguk kaŋ me noliŋiŋdi u nadiŋa indiŋ niŋguk, “Du maaŋgoŋ, adi timiŋit undugoŋ tigamŋit kaŋ Bepaŋdok munta mube tilaŋ?
Indi yadi kadakaniŋnikdok kibikoŋ tinimiŋit iŋgoŋ me yoŋ adi kadakaniŋ nemu tuguk.”
Unduŋ yoŋa yoguk, “Jesu, du mapme saŋiniŋgenit hatigene udaneeŋ buŋa nu maaŋ nadinambaaŋ.”
Kaŋ Jesudibo niŋguk, “Biyagoŋ hinek ganilat, du kamiŋgoŋ nukut yokwet fofooŋ gineŋ udim.”
Mele lekiŋgoŋ tubune kwet wanakaŋ mambip tubudapmaaŋ halune wooŋ 3 kilok tuguk.
Kaŋ Siloŋyot maaneŋ haule bulubuluyeŋ u lekiŋgoŋ bulagineune lufom mintaguk.
Kaŋ Jesudi gibita indiŋ katiguk, “Me baŋ, Munabuline kohoge gineŋ kamelat.” Unduŋ katiŋa uŋaniŋgoŋ kumuŋguk.
Unduŋ tubu mikme heki’walaŋ talitimeŋhikdi kudi u kaŋ Bepaŋ wou nintilooŋ yoguk, “Biyagoŋ hinek, me yoŋ adi me didimeniŋ.”
Metam hogohogok uŋoŋ buŋa bopnegiŋ adi kudi uŋoŋ mintaguk u kaŋ welehik gimiŋgimiŋ kulune udaneeŋ yohite ugiŋ.
Kaŋ Jesu meŋimeŋiye tiŋa tamwoi Galili gwaŋ tububihila keleŋti bugiŋ adi kabe-kweetniŋgoŋ yali nemenemek mintaguk u kagiŋ.
Me niŋ wou Josep adi Alimatiyaniŋ, adi yadi me talitimeŋ bop hatiyagiŋ’walaaneniŋ, tiŋa adi me didimeniŋ eŋ me momooŋ. Adi Bepaŋ’walaŋ Hatihati Kobuli miŋgoŋ mintadakaleu kakaŋdok woom hatiguk. Unduŋ doktiŋa me talitimeŋ noliŋiyedi Jesu medeŋiŋ ulatifooŋ kumuŋ gineŋ kamegiŋ kaŋ adi nadiune tuwot mu tuguk.
Me wendi Pailat namanda foloŋ wooŋ yali Jesu folooŋ dabaŋdok ninadiguk.
Kaŋ nadimimbu wooŋ Jesu koloŋdabek foloŋ kibidali tiŋafooŋ haule fafaudi yauneeŋ tiŋa wooŋ mehinek dabaŋ kameŋdok kawade fafaŋeniŋ wamukiŋneŋ uŋgoŋ kameguk.
Nai uŋaniŋ Sabat iitdok nai dulaune tiulidoko kwanai titiŋdok nai tuguk.
Kaŋ tamwoi Galili gwaŋ tububihila Jesu keletabugiŋ heki adi Josep dut wooŋ dabaŋ meyotneŋ dediŋ kameguk u kagiŋ.
Nemenemek u kadapmaaŋ udaneeŋ yopmaŋ wooŋ haguwo munduŋhinit tiulidokogiŋ. Sabat gineŋ adi Yodoko Mededi yolak undugoŋ keleeŋ hakula tigiŋ.
Sonda haniŋ timiŋ tamwoi adi pilali haguwo munduŋhinit tiulidokogiŋ u beŋa Jesu bomŋiŋ gineŋ ugiŋ.
Wooŋ kalune kawade wapum agaŋ dekeleune bom mami hamap yakuk.
Unduŋ kaŋ wooŋ maaneŋ fooŋ kalune Wapum Jesu’walaŋ dabaŋ uŋoŋ mu hakuk.
Unduŋ kaŋ nadibedi tiŋa yatu meyat lufom tinahukuthik holiholiŋenit wendi adi yakiŋneŋ uŋgoŋ mintayemgumuk.
Kaŋ tamwoi adi u yabuŋa munta tiŋa duwokeneeŋ kwetfoloŋ diweeŋ yakiŋ. Kaŋ meyat wendi indiŋ yeniŋgumuk, “Hidi maŋgoŋde me kaipmuŋ hatilakdok kumuhi’walaŋ kwet gineŋ iŋoŋ lohiiŋ?
Adi iŋoŋ mu hatak, adi agaŋ pilalak. Hidi koom Galili kwetneŋ gwaŋ hatiŋa mede indiŋ haniŋguk u nadisuneŋ.
‘Me Kobumuŋ adi me kadakahi kohohik foloŋ loune ulukumuneeŋ, kaŋ nai lufomkulitniŋ hali kaikaaŋ pilalaak.’”
Kaŋ tamwoi adi medeŋiŋ u naditomuŋa
bom gineniŋ udaneeŋ wooŋ mihiŋiye 11 u yeniŋa metam noli maaŋ kahat tiyemgiŋ.
Tamoi wohiye Maliya Madalaniŋ, eŋ Yoana eŋ Maliya Jems miŋ, adi tiŋa tamwoi noli noŋgoŋ yaugiŋ heki adi noŋgoŋ buŋa aposel heki nemek mintaguk u yeniŋgiŋ.
Iŋgoŋ aposel heki adi sububa mede binek yoŋa medehik u mu nadisukilitigiŋ.
Kaŋ Pitadi kiyaneeŋ bom gineŋ uguk, wooŋ maaneŋ heweŋa kaguk kaŋ hauleŋiŋ hogok ilu yabuŋa udaneeŋ yopmaŋ wooŋ nemek u mintaguk wendok nadiune uŋgoniŋ hinek tuguk.
Nai uŋaniŋgoŋ Jesu’walaŋ kayoŋbopŋiŋ gineniŋ meyat lufom adi yokwet niŋ wou Emaus uŋoŋ ude ugumuk. Talik Jelusalem biŋa Emausde uuŋdok u adi 12 kilomita hogok.
Ala adi talipmeŋ uŋila nemek mintaguk hogohogok wendok hayotaugumuk.
Meyat adi mede kiyonadi titaulune Jesu uŋgoŋ mintayemiŋa noŋgoŋ ugiŋ.
Iŋgoŋ nadinadihik mu tomguk doktiŋa tuwot mu kakiyondagumuk.
Kaŋ Jesudi indiŋ yeninadiguk, “Hidi maŋgoŋ mede yonadi tabamuk?” Unduŋ yenimbu meyat u bulaniŋgoŋ diweeŋ yakumuk.
Yali adi’walaaniŋ me wou niŋ Keleopa adi yoguk, “Metam kwetkwet Jelusalem buŋit hogohogok adi nemenemek uŋoŋ mintaŋak agaŋ nadidapmaŋit, kaŋ du kubugoŋdi nemek kobugoŋ mintaŋak u mu nadiŋaŋ be?”
Unduŋ yoguk kaŋ Jesudibo yeninadiguk, “Maŋgoŋ mintaŋak?” Kaŋ adibo indiŋ niŋgumuk, “Nemek Jesu Nasaletniŋ’walaŋ mintaŋak. Adi polofet, Bepaŋ dawineŋ be memetam dauhineŋ mede yoyo be kudi titiŋ u saŋiniŋnit hati tuluguk.
Kaŋ me Siloŋyot diniŋ talitimeŋ eŋ me wapuhiniyedi kumuŋdok nindapmaaŋ gapman kohoŋ foloŋ kameu adi yodapmaune koloŋdabek foloŋ ukiŋ.
Indi adi me wendigoŋ Isilaehi memetam kadakaniŋ gineniŋ ninigilaak yoŋa nadisukilitiŋa hatigumun. Kaŋ ulukumumbune hatine melenai agaŋ lufomkulitniŋ dapmalak.
Tiŋa kamiŋ indiŋ niŋ mintaŋak. Tamwoi noli indi’walaŋ bopnik gineniŋdi welenadifo mede indiŋ ninimbu boho tumun. Adi haniŋ timiŋ koŋ gineŋ uŋit.
Wooŋ kaŋit kaŋ Jesu’walaŋ dabaŋ uŋoŋ mu halak. Unduŋ kaŋ udaneeŋ buŋa indiŋ niniŋit. Aŋelo lufomdi mintayemiŋa Jesu agaŋ pilalak yenimuk.
Kaŋ mewoi nolidibo koŋ gineŋ uŋit wooŋ tamwoidi kaŋ buŋa yoŋit undugoŋ hinek adi maaŋ kaŋit. Iŋgoŋ ne adi mu kaŋit.”
Kaŋ Jesudi indiŋ yeniŋguk, “Hidi yadi nadinadihinit mokit tiŋa welehik adi gweheyehi doktiŋa polofet hekidi mede yogiŋ u mu nadisukilitiiŋ.
Hidi mu nadiiŋ be? Kilisto adi timeŋ folofigita nadiŋa mindaŋ Bepaŋdi wougigit mimiŋdok yoguk u kahilewaak.”
Unduŋ yoŋa netok Youkudip Mede gineŋ dediŋ yolak u yenindakaleguk. Tububihila Moses’walaŋ maŋiŋ mede gineŋ eŋ polofet heki’walaŋ Youkudip gineŋ yolak u yeniŋguk.
Unduŋ tiŋa wooŋ yokwet tubudulagiŋ. Tiŋa Jesu adi yokwet u kalakapmeŋ tiŋa wene tuguk
kaŋ adi moŋ niŋgumuk, “Mele agaŋ fohebilak ale indigut iŋgoŋ itnim.” Unduŋ nimbu adut itne fogiŋ.
Fooŋ nanaŋe nanaŋdok meyat dut noŋgoŋ ikiŋ. Ila adi belet tiŋa Bepaŋ niutumbaaŋ wobuŋa beŋa yemguk.
Unduŋ tubune dauhik tombune diwedakalegumuk. Kaŋ uŋaniŋgoŋ Jesu fila uune koti mu kagumuk.
Unduŋ tiŋa wabi nehi uŋgoŋ kiyonadi tiŋa indiŋ yogumuk, “Indi talipmeŋ bade mede niniŋa Bepaŋ’walaŋ Youkudip Mede mebi hinek ulitawaaŋ niniŋak. Kaŋ welenik yout hinek tiŋak.”
Unduŋ yohake nai uŋaniŋgoŋ pilali koti Jelusalemde ugumuk. Wosuwaaŋ ne’niŋ mihiŋiye 11 tiŋa metam noli noŋgoŋ bopne hatu wooŋ yabune
indiŋ yeniŋgiŋ, “Wapum adi biyaku agaŋ pilalak, tiŋa Pita mintamiŋak.”
Unduŋ yobu adibo nemek talipmeŋ mintayemguk wendok kahat tiyemgumuk, tiŋa belet wobune nai uŋaniŋ kakiyondagumuk wendok maaŋ yenimbune nadigiŋ.
Mede kahat unduŋ hatulune Jesu ne lekiŋgoŋhik gineŋ uŋgoŋ mintaaŋ yakuk,
u kaŋ sukule tigiŋ. Untiŋa momolok binek kayam yoŋa munta tigiŋ.
Kaŋ adibo yeniŋguk, “Maŋgoŋde nadibedi tiiŋ? Maŋgoŋde welelufom tiiŋ?
Kohone kayone yabuneŋ. Nu nagoŋ mintahamulat. Nohoneeŋ kaneŋ. Momolok adi nu nohoneeŋ nabiiŋ undihi moŋ. Adi yadi gom tiŋa kitilihinit mokit.”
Unduŋ yoŋa kayoŋ kohoŋ yembune yabugiŋ.
U yabuŋa wele kukut tiŋa boho gimiŋgimiŋ tigiŋ iŋgoŋ oŋ, mu nadisukilitigiŋ. Untiŋa nadififile tubune adibo yeniŋguk, “Hidi nanaŋe neeŋbe boiŋa hakiiŋ?”
Unduŋ yeninadiguk kaŋ pisi heheŋnit diki niŋ tiŋa miŋgiŋ.
Kaŋ adi tiŋa naune kagiŋ
kaŋ yeniŋguk, “Nu hidigut hatiŋila indiŋ hanilugut, ‘Nemenemek nutok koom Moses’walaŋ Yodoko Mede gineŋ be polofet heki’walaŋ Youkudip gineŋ be Kap gineŋ hatak u hogohogok u biyagoŋ mintadapmawaak.’”
Tiŋa Bepaŋ’walaŋ mede nadineŋdok nadinadisuhik tubudakaleyemiŋa
indiŋ yeniŋguk, “Youkudip Mededi indiŋ yolak, ‘Kilisto adi folofigita nadiŋa kumuŋa nai lufomkulitniŋ hali pilalaak.
Adi’walaŋ wou foloŋ kwetkwet metam hogohogok Mede Momooŋ yenindapmaune welehik tubutakaleneeŋ kaŋ Bepaŋdi kadakaniŋhik tumolokuyembaak.’ Kwanai u adi Jelusalem iŋoŋ tububuhitdok.
Hidi kuyeŋ dauhik gineŋ nemenemek hogohogok mintaune kaŋit wendok yohauta tineeŋ.
Tiŋa i nadineŋ, Batnedi nemek hiditok gigit hanindapmaguk u kamehambe fowaak. Unduŋ dokti hidi yokwet wapum i pilap mu bikabuneeŋ. Iŋgoŋ hatilune kunum gineniŋ saŋiniŋ kamehambe fowaak.”
Unduŋ yeniŋa yahaŋeeŋ yokwet biŋa Betanide ugiŋ. Uŋoŋ wosuwaaŋ kohoŋ tiŋa looŋ kahaŋ tiyemguk.
Kahaŋ tiyemiŋa uŋaniŋgoŋ biyabuŋa kunum gineŋ loguk.
Unduŋ tubune adi wou nintilooŋ welenadifo tiŋa udaneeŋ kotigoŋ Jelusalemde ugiŋ.
Tiŋa helemahelemaŋ Siloŋyotneŋ uŋoŋ hatiŋa Bepaŋ niutumba hati tigiŋ.
Maŋiŋ Mede adi agaŋ koomkwaha kwetkunum mu mintalune hatitabuŋa hatiguk. Tiŋa Maŋiŋ Mede adi hatihatiŋiŋ Bepaŋ’walaŋkade halune hatiguk. Eŋ Maŋiŋ Mede negoŋ Bepaŋ hatiguk.
Adi tububihit gineŋgoŋ Bepaŋ dut hatiŋila
nemenemek adutgoŋ noŋgoŋ yehitubu-mintagumuk. Nemek noli u adi mokit nemu yehitubu-mintaguk.
Tiŋa adi yadi hatihati molom doktiŋa metam hogohogok hauta tubumintayemguk.
Kaŋ hauta adi mambip gineŋ hautaune mambipdi hefuladok moŋ tikaŋ wabiguk.
Unduŋ mintaune Bepaŋ adi metamdi medeŋiŋ nadiŋa nadisukiliti tubumintadok yoŋa tipilapilaye-meŋiŋ niŋ wou Jon kameune buŋa metam hauta wondiniŋ gigit yenihautaguk.
Jon ne adi hauta molom moŋ, adi yadi tobo Hauta wondiniŋ gigit u metam yenihautaguk.
Hauta woŋ adi folooŋ hinekdi metam hogohogok hautanimilak. Adi yadi kwetfoloŋ mintaguk.
Tiŋa Maŋiŋ Mede negoŋ kwet kunum yehitubu-mintaguk ala adi kwetfoloŋ iŋoŋ hatiguk, iŋgoŋ metamdi mu kadakalegiŋ.
Eŋ ne yolikwelineŋ uune metamdi mu kahilegiŋ.
Kaŋ nolidigoŋ kahileeŋ nadisukilitimiŋgiŋ, doktiŋa Bepaŋ’walaŋ wapmihi mintadok yenindapmaguk.
Unduŋ doktiŋa adi kwetfoloŋ metam’walaŋ wapmihi moŋ, be kwetfoloŋ metam nehi’walaŋ nadinadihik gineŋ mu mintagiŋ, adi yadi Bepaŋ ne’walaŋ kohokudi doktiŋa Bepaŋ negoŋ Behik hatilak.
Maŋiŋ Mede adi mehinek mintaaŋ indi lekiŋgoŋnik gineŋ Bepaŋ’walaŋ siloŋ tobogoŋ eŋ mede biyagoŋnit hatiguk. Kaŋ indi Bepaŋ’walaŋ Mihiŋiŋ kubugoŋ hinek yoŋa wougigit eŋ holiholiŋe miŋguk u miŋgoŋ kagumun.
Jondi aditok yoŋa indiŋ yohautaguk, “Nu me yendegoŋ indiŋ yogut, ‘Me mindaŋ bulak adi nu mu mintawe koom hatiguk. Adi nu nalakapmeŋ tilak.’”
Indi adi’walaŋ siloŋ tobogoŋ u dapmandapmaŋnit mokit moŋgokumundi moŋgokam.
Moses adi Yodoko Mede nimguk kaŋ Jesu Kilisto adi siloŋ tobogoŋ mede biyagoŋ nimguk.
Bepaŋ adi nebek niŋdi nemu hinek kaguk. Mihiŋiŋ kubugoŋ hinek ne’walaŋ hebeŋ gineŋ hatilakdi gigitŋiŋ tiŋa fooŋ yohautaguk.
Jelusalem uŋoŋ Judame heki’walaŋ me wapuhi adi Siloŋyot diniŋ talitimeŋhiye eŋ tubuloda mehiye yeniŋkulune Jon’walaŋ wooŋ ninadigiŋ, “Du nedigoŋ hinek?”
Kaŋ Jon adi mebiŋiŋ kamehebi mu tiŋa miŋgilaŋgoŋ indiŋ yenihautaguk, “Nu Kilisto moŋ.”
Unduŋ yenimbune gigine tiŋa ninadigiŋ, “Kaŋ du neeŋ? Du Ilaija be?” Ninadigiŋ kaŋ yeniŋguk, “Nu adi moŋ.” Unduŋ yenimbu ninadigiŋ, “Kaŋ du Polofetnik be?” Yobu “Moŋ” yeniŋguk.
Mede u nadiŋa niŋgiŋ, “Unduŋ ale du datok dediŋ yolaŋ u ninimbune wooŋ me wapuhi niniŋkulune bumun u yeninim.”
Unduŋ ninadigiŋ kaŋ polofet Aisaiyadi mede indiŋ youkuk u yeniŋguk, “Me niŋ kwet fiileŋ indiŋ kutilak, ‘Wapum’walaŋ talik didimeŋgoŋ imindok.’ Mede unduŋ yoguk u nu iŋakoŋ.”
Unduŋ yenimbune nohiye Falisi heki wanaŋ bugiŋdi indiŋ nintogiŋ,
“Du Kilisto moŋ, be du Ilaija moŋ, tiŋa du Polofet moŋ, iŋgoŋ deti Imeyout kwanai tilaŋ?”
Unduŋ nimbune Jondibo yoguk, “Nu adi ime hinekdi hogok youyemulat iŋgoŋ me niŋ lekiŋgoŋhik gineŋ mintaaŋ hatilak u hidi mu kakiyondaiŋ.
Adi yadi mindaŋ bulak, nu aindiniŋdi gulalikŋiŋ tagimimbitdok tuwot moŋ.”
Nemenemek u Jondi Imeyout kwanai hautitugukneŋ Jodan ime fukuniŋ Betani uŋoŋ tigiŋ.
Unduŋ tigiŋ ala heleune Jondi yali kaune Jesu kweetniŋgoŋ gwaŋ buguk kaŋ yoguk, “Bepaŋ’walaŋ Dompa Mihiniŋ gu bulak oŋ. Adikuyeŋ kwetfoloŋ metam’walaŋ kadakaniŋhik tumolokulaak.
Nu me wondegoŋ indiŋ haniŋgut, ‘Me mindaŋ bulak adi nu mu mintagutneŋ hatiguk doktiŋa adi nu nalakapmeŋ tilak.’
Nu na koom mu nadidakalemiŋgut iŋgoŋ Isilae metam indi daunik gineŋ mintadakaledok yoŋa Imeyout kwanai tububihikut.”
Unduŋ yoŋa netok indiŋ yeniŋguk, “Nu yali kawene Uŋgoniŋ Munabulidi kunum gineniŋ butigili wele tiŋa fooŋ Jesu foloŋ ikuk.
Nu na hogok me u tuwot mu nadidakalemimbe tugut iŋgoŋ me naniŋkut tuguk adi indiŋ naniŋguk, me niŋ Imeyout timimbaaŋ kaŋ Uŋgoniŋ Munabulidi adi foloŋ foune kawaaŋ adi kuyeŋ metam Munabulidi youyembaak.
Nu adi uŋakoŋ kagut doktiŋa mebiŋiŋ indiŋ hanilat, adi Bepaŋ Mihiŋiŋ.”
Heleune Jon adi mihiŋiyat lufom dut noŋgoŋ yakiŋ
ala Jesu buŋa uune kaŋ yeniŋguk, “Bepaŋ’walaŋ Dompa Mihiniŋ gu kademek.”
Unduŋ yenimbune nadiŋa meyat u Jesu kelegumuk.
Kaŋ Jesudi udaneeŋ yabuŋa yeniŋguk, “Hidi maŋgoŋ kaliŋ bamuk?” Unduŋ yenimbune yogumuk, “Hinale, du yot daŋ itoulaŋ?”
Unduŋ ninadigumuk kaŋ yeniŋguk, “Buŋa kademek.” Mele agaŋ fofoŋ tibe tulune yeniyanagila ugiŋ. Wooŋ kaŋ uŋgoŋ noŋgoŋ ikiŋ.
Meyat Jon’walaŋ mede nadiŋa kelegumuk adi’walaaniŋ niŋ adi wou Endulu, adi Saimon kwayaŋ.
Kaŋ adi pilap wooŋ dali tubumintaaŋ niŋguk, “Indi Mesiya agaŋ kamut.” (Mesiya adi Gilik mede gineŋ Kilisto yoyagiŋ.)
Unduŋ niŋa Saimon nagila Jesu’walaŋ ugumuk kaŋ Jesudi Saimon kaŋ niŋguk, “Du adi Jon mihiŋiŋ ala wohoge Saimon iŋgoŋ kobuk adi wohoge Sifas ganilat.” (U Gilik mede gineŋ Pita yoyagiŋ, mede mebi ‘kawade hakat’.)
Unduŋ tiŋa ikiŋ ala heleune Jesudi Galilide wene tiulidokooŋ wooŋ Filip tubumintaaŋ niŋguk, “Du buŋa nehikeleweŋ.”
(Filip tiŋa Endulu eŋ Pita adi Besaidahi.)
Ala Filipdibo wooŋ Nataniyel tubumintaaŋ niŋguk, “Indi me koom Mosesdi Yodoko Mede gineŋ medeŋiŋ youkuk eŋ polofet hekidi maaŋ aditok mede youkiŋ u agaŋ kamun. Adi Josep mihiŋiŋ Jesu, Nasaletniŋ.”
Nataniyeldi mede u nadiune tuwot mu tubune yoguk, “Nasalet uŋoŋ nemek fofooŋ kedembe mintawek.” Unduŋ yobu Filipdi niŋguk, “Unda buune noŋgoŋ wooŋ kadim.”
Unduŋ yoŋa ugumuk, wooŋ Nataniyeldi Jesu hakukneŋ tubudulalune Jesudi kaŋ indiŋ yoguk, “Me yoŋ adi Isilae me folooŋ hinek. Weleŋ maaneŋ kadakaniŋ be yalaŋ nemu hatak.”
Unduŋ yobune Nataniyeldibo ninadiguk, “Du deti nadinamulaŋ?” Unduŋ ninadiguk kaŋ Jesudibo yoguk, “Du Filipdi mu wooŋ kutiganiŋak uŋaniŋ bem yooŋneŋ hatune gabuŋat.”
Unduŋ yoguk kaŋ Nataniyeldibo niŋguk, “Hinale, biyagoŋ hinek, du adi Bepaŋ Mihiŋiŋ, Isilaehi’walaŋ mapme.”
Unduŋ nimbune Jesudibo yoguk, “Du bem yooneŋ gabuŋat yoot wendok-kube tiŋa nadisukilitilaŋ? Kudi kobuk mintaŋak i kuyaniŋ-kabe kaŋaŋ. Iŋgoŋ oŋ, kougoŋ adi kudi wapuhi hinek mintatawaak kaŋ yabaaŋ.”
Unduŋ yeniŋa tomboyoula indiŋ yeniŋguk, “Nu biyagoŋ hinek hanilat, hidi kunum dilitombune Bepaŋ’walaŋ aŋeloŋiye Me Kobumuŋ’walaŋkade loŋatfoŋat tubune yabuneŋ.”
Helebufa lufom dapmaune Galili kwet wapum Kana yokwetneŋ metam lufomdi kohokukut tubune hinaŋ wapum tigiŋ. Nai uŋaniŋ Jesu miŋ
eŋ Jesu tiŋa mihiŋiye adi maaŋ wooŋ nanaŋe noŋgoŋ nanaŋdok yenimbu ugiŋ.
Wooŋ nanaŋe nanaŋ hatiŋa wain nadapmagiŋ kaŋ Jesu miŋdi yoguk, “Wain agaŋ dapmalak.”
Unduŋ nimbune Jesudi yoguk, “Du nemenemek titiŋdok mu nanimbeŋ. Nu’walaŋ nai kougoŋ mintawaak.”
Unduŋ nimbune Jesu miŋdi tipilapilaye-metam indiŋ yeniŋguk, “Hidi Jesudi mede hanimbek wondok tuwot keleŋ tineŋ.”
Nai uŋaniŋ yot uŋoŋ kwetkabot kweheyehi 6 boigiŋ, u Judame heki nehi’walaŋ titiŋhik keleeŋ kohoyoutet titiŋdok yoŋa boiune ikagiŋ. Kwetkabot u kuyahi moŋ, wapuhi hinek.
Ala Jesudi tipilapilaye-metam yenimbune ime gilaŋa buŋa kwetkabot wapuhi gineŋ utokotaugiŋ.
Kaŋ yeniŋguk, “Agaŋ ale neeŋ gila wooŋ me hinamuni kadokolak mimbune naaŋ kawek.” Unduŋ yenimbune ime wain mintaguk u gila wooŋ mimbune
naaŋ wain deŋaniŋ buguk u mu nadiguk. Tipilapilaye metam heki adi agaŋ nadigiŋ iŋgoŋ adi mu nadiguk doktiŋa me kohokukut tuguk u kutinimbu buune niŋguk,
“Me hinamuni tiiŋ adi metam timeŋ wain kobahi yembu naaŋ kabe-nadibubuyeune mindaŋ wain hogohi yemiiŋ kaŋ naiŋ, iŋgoŋ du deti wain fofooŋ i kamehebi hali kobugoŋ ti bulaŋ.”
Jesu adi Bepaŋ kunumneniŋ’walaŋ kudi miŋgoŋ tububihila tubune mintadakaleguk. Kudi i yokwet wapum Kana, Galili kwetneŋ uŋoŋ tuguk. Nai uŋaniŋ saŋiniŋŋiŋ miŋgoŋ mintaune mihiŋiyedi kaŋ nadisukilitimiŋgiŋ.
Unduŋ tiŋa Jesu adi miŋ kwayaŋiye eŋ mihiŋiye dut Kafanaumde wooŋ helebufa noli uŋgoŋ hatigiŋ.
Aŋelodi Yabukiyondaaŋ Yalakapmeguk diniŋ hinamuni titiŋdok nai dulaune Jesu adi maaŋ Jelusalemde loguk.
Looŋ kaune Siloŋyot diniŋ hamuhe gineŋ metamdi makau, eŋ dompa, eŋ butigili heki boiŋa kibikibi tigiŋ kaŋ metam noli kweetniŋ bugiŋdi muneeŋhik moŋgola falik foloŋ boiŋa tubudidimeeŋ Judahi’walaŋ muneeŋ begiŋ.
Unduŋ tigiŋ kaŋ Jesu adi yabuŋa tawa moŋgola bilibet tubune kwadi mintaune woŋgoŋ kale heki widihi yehikeleune fakaŋ fougiŋ. Tiŋa falik heki kwatapene moŋgoloune muneeŋ makwanegiŋ.
Kaŋ me butigili boiyakiŋ u indiŋ yeniŋguk, “Bomboŋhik moŋgola founeŋ. Batne’walaŋ yoli i kibikibi yot mu titiŋdok.”
Unduŋ yobune mihiŋiye adi Youkudip Mede indiŋ yolak u naditomgiŋ, “Nu yokedok nadiwe uŋgoniŋ tilak doktiŋa uŋgoniŋ undugoŋ hahatdok gigine tilat.”
Jesudi unduŋ tubune Judame heki’walaŋ talitimeŋ hekidibo indiŋ tubu-udaneeŋ niŋgiŋ, “Du unduŋ tilaŋ doktiŋa Bepaŋ’walaŋ kudi neeŋ tubune gabuŋa nadine biyagoŋ du kwanai wendegoŋ ganindapmagiŋ unduŋ tibek.”
Unduŋ yogiŋ kaŋ Jesudibo yeniŋguk, “Bepaŋ’walaŋ yot i uyakulune nu helebufa lufomkulitniŋ maaneŋ kedem tubupilalaat.”
Yenimbu mede fafaŋeniŋ indiŋ niŋgiŋ, “Wapmuhiniye adi gulet 46 unduŋ kaŋ Siloŋyot i madapmagiŋ iŋgoŋ du melenai lufomkulitniŋ maaneŋ hogok kedembe tubupilalaaŋ yo yolaŋ?”
Jesu adi ne sigiŋ gitnemdok nadiŋa yoguk.
Ala kougoŋ kumuŋ gineŋ kaikaaŋ pilalu mihiŋiye adi mede u nadidakaleeŋ Youkudip Mede eŋ Jesu ne mede yoguk u nadisukilitigiŋ.
Aŋelodi Yabukiyondaaŋ Yalakapmeguk diniŋ hinamuni Jelusalem kwetneŋ ha tigiŋ nai uŋaniŋ Jesu adi Bepaŋ kunumneniŋ’walaŋ kudi mebimebi tubune metamdi kaŋ nadisukilitimiŋgiŋ.
Tiŋa Jesu adi welehik maaneŋ agaŋ yabunadidapmaguk doktiŋa mu nadisukilitiyemguk.
Nebek niŋdi adi’walaŋ mebihik Jesu ninindok tuwot moŋ. Maŋgoŋde, woŋadi agaŋ ne yabunadidapmaguk.
Falisi heki’walaaniŋ me nohik niŋ hatiluguk wou Nikodimas. Adi Judame heki’walaŋ me talitimeŋ wapum maaŋ hatiluguk.
Ala heleniŋ timiŋ wooŋ Jesu kaŋ niŋguk, “Hinale, indi mebige agaŋ nadiyam. Nebek niŋdi ne hogok hatiŋa du Bepaŋ kunumneniŋ’walaŋ kudi tilaŋ undiniŋ tuwot mu tibetik, doktiŋa Bepaŋdi hinale gapmeune buguŋ u agaŋ nadiyam.”
Unduŋ yoguk kaŋ Jesudibo niŋguk, “Nu biyagoŋ hinek ganimbe nadiweŋ. Nebek niŋdi mintaminta kobuli mu mintawaak adi Bepaŋ’walaŋ hebeŋ gineŋ Hatihati Uŋgoniŋ tuwot mu kahilewaak.”
Yobune Nikodimasdi sukule tiŋa indiŋ yoguk, “Kei! Me agaŋ bedinaditom tiiŋ undihidi dediŋ tiŋa kotigoŋ mehiye welehik maaneŋ fooŋ eyaŋ mintaneŋ?”
Unduŋ yoguk kaŋ Jesudibo indiŋ tubu-udanemiŋguk, “Biyagoŋ hinek ganilat. Nebek niŋdi ime eŋ munabuli gineŋ kobuli mu mintawaak adi Bepaŋ’walaŋ Hatihati Uŋgoniŋ mu kahilewaak.
Mede wendiniŋ mebi indiŋ. Kwetfoloŋ me’walaaniŋ mintalak adi yadi meeniŋ. Eŋ Munabuli’walaaniŋ mintalak adi yadi munabuli.
Nu eyaŋ nabugoŋ kotigoŋ mintaaŋ Hatihati Uŋgoniŋ kahiledok mede ganilat i nadiŋa boho mu tibeŋ.
Sububadi kaka feditak. Kaŋ du gigilitŋiŋ nadilaŋ, iŋgoŋ deŋandiŋ tububihila bulak be deŋandiŋ wooŋ dapmalak u mu kalaŋ. Metam Munabulidi yehitubu-mintalak adi’walaŋ mebihik undihi kuyoŋ.”
Unduŋ yobune Nikodimasdi indiŋ tubu-udanemiŋguk, “U dediŋ tiŋa unduŋ tibek ou!”
Yobune Jesudi niŋguk, “Du Isilaehi’walaŋ hinale wapum iŋgoŋ deti mu nadidakalelaŋ!
Biyagoŋ hinek ganilat. Indi nemek kagumun be nadiyam wendiniŋ mede yoyam iŋgoŋ hidi adi nadihaŋinda tiiŋ.
Hidi nemek kwetfoloŋ diniŋ mede yobene mu nadisukilitiiŋdi dediŋ tiŋa kunum gineŋ nemek hebihat tilak wondok yobene kedem nadisukilitineeŋ?
Tiŋa nebek niŋdi kunum gineŋ nemu loguk, mokoŋ. Toboniŋ Me Kobumuŋ adi kunum gineniŋ foguk.
“Mosesdi koom kwet fiileŋ uŋoŋ miŋgembet welewele tiŋalooŋ kambiyakuk undugoŋ Me Kobumuŋ adi maaŋ tiŋaloneeŋ.
Unduŋ tubune nediyeŋ nadisukilitimimbaak adi hatihati dapmandapmaŋnit mokit kahilewaak.
“Bepaŋ adi metam weleŋdi hinek yabukahileguk doktiŋa Mihiŋiŋ kubugoŋ hinek kameu foguk. Adi unduŋ tuguk doktiŋa metam adi nadisukilitimineeŋ hogohogok adi kadaka tiŋa fiit mu tineeŋ, adi tobo hatihati dapmandapmaŋnit mokit kahileneeŋ.
Unduŋ doktiŋa Bepaŋ adi Mihiŋiŋ kwetfoloŋ iŋoŋ kameu foguk adi metam mede gineŋ yapmeeŋ yehitubu-kadaka titiŋdok mu yoŋa kameu foguk. Adi tobo yehitubu-loda titiŋdok yoŋa kameu foguk.
Nebek niŋ adi-Mihiŋiŋ nadisukilitimilak aditok adi mede yodapmaŋ nai gineŋ kibikoŋ malabumuŋ hekidok mu nindapmawaak. Eŋ nebek niŋ adi Bepaŋ Mihiŋiŋ mu nadisukilitimimbaak aditok adi kibikoŋdok mede agaŋ yodapmaŋit hatak. Maŋgoŋde, adi yadi Bepaŋ Mihiŋiŋ kubugoŋ hinehinek adi’walaŋ wou mu nadisukilitilak doktiŋa malabumuŋ hekiwaak.
“Kibikoŋ diniŋ mebi adi indiŋ: Bepaŋ’walaŋ hautadi kwetfoloŋ mintaguk iŋgoŋ metam adi titiŋhik hogohi doktiŋa hauta gineŋ uuŋdok lakata tiŋa mambip gineŋ hatidok nadigiŋ.
Nebek niŋ kadakaniŋ tilak adi hatihatiŋiŋ diniŋ mebi mintadakalewaakneŋ yoŋa hauta kaŋ muntaaŋ tabamiŋ tilak.
Me nediyeŋ mede biyagoŋ nadiŋa keleeŋ hatibaak adi hauta gineŋ hatibaak. Unduŋ tiŋa titiŋŋiŋdi Bepaŋ’walaŋ maŋiŋ mede tagimneeŋ hatilak unduŋ mintadakalewaak.”
Unduŋ tiŋa hatiŋa Jesudi mihiŋiye yahaŋeeŋ yokwet biŋa Judiya magimagineŋ ugiŋ, wooŋ adut hatiŋa Imeyout kwanai tigiŋ.
Adi unduŋ tulune Jon maaŋ undugoŋ Inon, Selimkade uŋoŋ ime fee doktiŋa metam feedi uune Imeyout kwanai tiyemguk.
(Jon yot fafaŋeniŋneŋ mu kamegiŋneŋ, nai uŋaniŋ kwanai u tuguk.)
Jon mihiŋiye noli adi Judame niŋdut Imeyout tali dediŋ gineŋ tiŋa Bepaŋ’walaŋ namanda foloŋ uŋgoniŋ hatidok wendok siwenegiŋ.
Siweneeŋ Jon’walaŋ wooŋ yogiŋ, “Hinale, du Jodan ime guŋandiŋ hatibune me niŋ gehitubu-mintaune adi’walaŋ mebi ninindakaleguŋ, adi nai indidegoŋ Imeyout kwanai tubune metam feedi adi’walaŋkade uune Imeyout tiyemulak.”
Unduŋ yogiŋ kaŋ Jondibo yeniŋguk, “Nebek niŋdi nemenemek ne tuwot mu moŋgotak, Bepaŋdi mimbune kedem moŋgotak.
Nu koom indiŋ haniŋgut, hidi u agaŋ nadiiŋ. ‘Nu adi Kilisto moŋ, nu adi gigitŋiŋ yohautadok hogok.’
Me nediyeŋ tam titiŋdok gigit nimbu hatilak adi tam tubune me neeŋ gebiŋ yalimilak adi nadifo tilak. Nu nadifo undiniŋ agaŋ mintanamulak.
Adi’walaŋ wougigitdi lowek kaŋ nu’walaŋ fofoŋnit tibek.”
Jondi unduŋ yoŋa indiŋ tomboyoula yeniŋguk, “Me kunum gineniŋ adi yadi loloŋnit hinek tilak kaŋ metam hogohogok adi fofoŋnit tiiŋ. Tiŋa me kwetfoloŋniŋ adi kwetfoloŋ nemenemek mintalak wondok yolak, kaŋ me kunum gineniŋ foguk adi yadi metam hogohogok yalakapmedapmaaŋ loloŋnit hinek tilak.
Tiŋa adi nemenemek kunum gineŋ kaŋ nadiguk u yolak kaŋ metamdi medeŋiŋ mu nadimiiŋ.
Kaŋ nebek niŋdi medeŋiŋ nadiŋa nadidahi tilakdi Bepaŋ’walaŋ mede biyagoŋ yoŋa hatilak.
Bepaŋdi Mihiŋiŋ kameu buguk u Munabuli dapmandapmaŋnit mokit milak doktiŋa Bepaŋ’walaŋ medeŋiŋ uŋakoŋ yolak.
Tiŋa Beudi Mihiŋiŋdok uŋgoniŋ hinek nadimiŋguk doktiŋa nemenemek hogohogok adi kohoŋ gineŋ mindapmaguk.
Unduŋ doktiŋa nebek niŋ Mihi nadisukilitimilak adi yadi hatihati dapmadapmaŋnit mokit u agaŋ indidegoŋ kahileeŋ hatilak, eŋ nebek niŋ Mihi medeŋiŋ mu nadiwaak adi yadi hatihati mu kahilewaak, tobo Bepaŋ’walaŋ kwihitadi adut haliwooŋ halaak.”
Falisi heki adi Jesu’walaŋ kahat indiŋ nadigiŋ. Adi metam fee yahaŋeeŋ Jon kalakapmeeŋ Imeyout kwanai tilak. Iŋgoŋ folooŋ hinek adi Jesu ne mu tuluguk, adi mihiŋiyedi youyemagiŋ. Unduŋ yogiŋ kaŋ Jesudi mede u nadiŋa Judiya kwet bikabuŋa Galilide udaneeŋ uguk.
Unduŋ tiŋa wooŋ Samaliya talik keletawooŋ
Saika yokwet u Samaliya kwet lekiŋgoŋ hakukneŋ uŋoŋ wosuwaguk. Kwet woŋ adi Jekopdi mihiŋiŋ Josepdok nindapmaguk.
Ala Jesu adi talik uge uge mele lekiŋgoŋ tubune gweheyeeŋ Jekop’walaŋ Ime Bom gagayeŋ uŋgoŋ ikula tulune
mihiŋiye adi nanaŋe tuwane yokwet maaneŋ ugiŋ. Kaŋ Samaliya tam niŋ adi ime gilene buguk kaŋ Jesudi niŋguk, “Ime neeŋ gitnambu nawit.”
Unduŋ niŋguk kaŋ Samaliya tamdibo niŋguk, “Du Judame kaŋ nu Samaliyaniŋ, iŋgoŋ deti nu ime gikambit yoŋa nanilaŋ?” (Nai uŋaniŋ Judame heki adi Samaliyahi dut not momooŋgoŋ mu tagiŋ.)
Unduŋ yobune Jesudibo niŋguk, “Du Bepaŋ siloŋŋiŋ diniŋ mebi, be me imedok ganilat nu’walaŋ mebine u maaŋ mu nadidakalelaŋ. U nadidakaleluweŋ binek adi dubo naninadiune nubo ime hatihatinit gamuliwit.”
Unduŋ niŋguk kaŋ tamdibo niŋguk, “Wapum, ime bom i fuliŋmamaŋ hinek kaŋ du ime toutge nemoŋ, iŋgoŋ hatihati diniŋ ime mayeŋ gile yolaŋ?
Ime bom yadi koom Jekop tiŋa mihiŋiye eŋ kale makauŋiye dut nayagiŋ ala inditok nimguk. Ale du Jekop kalakapmeeŋ kedembe ime niŋ tubumintawit yo yolaŋ?”
Unduŋ yoguk kaŋ Jesudibo niŋguk, “Nebek niŋ ime i nawaak adi yadi maŋiŋ kotigoŋ galiwaak,
eŋ ime nu mimbit adi naaŋ weleŋ maaneŋ ime dawineŋ sila bulak undiniŋ naŋgatnit mokit haliuluwaak. Kaŋ ime wendigoŋ hatihati tubumintamimbaak doktiŋa imedok kotigoŋ mu nadiwaak.”
Unduŋ niŋguk kaŋ tamdibo yoguk, “Wapum, ime u nambu naaŋ kotigoŋ imedok mu nadiluwaat eŋ ime kaliŋ iŋoŋ kotigoŋ mu buluwaat.”
Unduŋ nimbune Jesudibo yoguk, “Wooŋ yohoge niŋa kotigoŋ budemek.”
Nimbune tamdibo yoguk, “Nu yohone moŋ.” Unduŋ yoguk kaŋ Jesudibo niŋguk, “Du yohoge moŋ u biyagoŋ hinek yolaŋ.
Iŋgoŋ du me yokunathik kohofukuŋ tibiŋtibiŋ tuguŋ, tiŋa me kobuk hatiyamuk adi du’walaŋ yohoge moŋ doktiŋa u biyagoŋ hinek nanilaŋ.”
Unduŋ yobune tamdibo yoguk, “O wapumne, nu kamiŋ gabunadi-dakalelat. Du polofet.
Ale kedembe nanimbu nadiwit. Koom wapuhiniye adi kweboboe yendok foloŋ bopneeŋ Bepaŋ niutumbadok niniŋgiŋ, iŋgoŋ Judame hidi yadi Jelusalem uŋoŋ bopneeŋ niutumbadok yoiŋ.”
Unduŋ yobune Jesudibo niŋguk, “Biyagoŋ hinek indiŋ ganilat. Nai niŋ baakneŋ uŋoŋ hidi kweboboe yeŋdok be Jelusalem uŋoŋ bopneeŋ Bepaŋ mu niutumbaneeŋ.
Tiŋa Samaliyahi hidi mu nadidakaleeŋ niutumbaiŋ iŋgoŋ tutumbatutumba u Judahi indi’walaŋ mintaguk doktiŋa indi agaŋ nadidakaleeŋ niutumbayam.
Nai niŋ agaŋ dulalak uŋoŋ Bepaŋ’walaŋ kayoŋbopŋiye hinek adi Bepaŋ folooŋ hinek nadidakaleeŋ welehikdigoŋ hinek niutumbaneeŋ. Bepaŋ adi metam undihidok nadiyembune utumba tilak.
Bepaŋ adi Munabuli doktiŋa metam adi Munabuli’walaŋ saŋiniŋ foloŋ biyagoŋ hinek niutumbayaneeŋ.”
Unduŋ yoguk kaŋ Samaliya tamdibo niŋguk, “Nu Kilisto baak u agaŋ nadilat ale adi buŋa nemenemek hogohogok kedem ninindakalewaak.”
Kaŋ Jesudibo niŋguk, “Mede ganilat nu na iŋakoŋ.”
Jesu adi Samaliya tam dut unduŋ ha-yolu mihiŋiye adi udaneeŋ buŋa yabuŋa boho tigiŋ. Tiŋa mihiŋiyedi Jesu “Tam u maŋgoŋdok ninadilaŋ,” be “Dediŋ doktiŋa ninadilaŋ,” unduŋ ninadidok nadibedi tiŋa wabi tigiŋ.
Kaŋ tam u imetoutŋiŋ uŋgoŋ kameeŋ kiyaneeŋ yokwet maaneŋ wooŋ metam indiŋ yeniŋguk,
“Ai! Hidige! Me i nu nemenemek koom tugut be kobuk tilat hogohogok u nanimbihitak doktiŋa Kilisto uŋakoŋ binek, ale buŋa wooŋ kaneŋ.”
Unduŋ yobune metamdi yokwet bikabuŋa Jesu kane ugiŋ.
Adi unduŋ tulune Jesu adi mihiŋiyedi nanaŋe neeŋ naweŋ yoŋa niŋgiginegiŋ.
Kaŋ yeniŋguk, “Nu nanaŋene niŋ hatnamulak u hidi mu nadiiŋ.”
Unduŋ yeniŋguk kaŋ mihiŋiye adi nehi uŋgoŋ yonadiŋa yogiŋ, “Nanaŋe nebek neeŋ bidak moŋgola buŋa miŋit.”
Unduŋ yogiŋ kaŋ Jesudi u nadiŋa yeniŋguk, “Me napmeune fogut adi’walaŋ maŋiŋ tagimneeŋ kwanai titawooŋ tubudapmawaat wendi nanaŋene folooŋ.
Hidi indiŋ yoiŋ: muyakip lufolufom dapmaune nanaŋe folooŋ mintawaak. Iŋgoŋ nu indiŋ hanilat, dinina gineŋ baigoŋ hinek diwekaneŋ. Nanaŋe adi agaŋ kita tiiŋ.
Me moŋgoboi tilak adi tuwaŋiŋ agaŋ moŋgotak eŋ nanaŋe folooŋ wendi hatihati fafaŋeniŋdok gigit tibaak. Kaŋ me diniyeti tilak be me moŋgoboi tilak adi wanaŋ nadifo tidemeek.
Doktiŋa mede indiŋ yoiŋ u biyagoŋ, me niŋdi diniyeti tubune me niŋdi moŋgoboi tilak.
Hidi kwanaimiŋ mu tigiŋ iŋgoŋ nolidi kwanaimiŋ tubune mintagukneŋ wooŋ moŋgo bopnedok yoŋa haniŋkutat.”
Kaŋ Samaliya tamdi yolineŋhi indiŋ yeniŋguk, “Nu nemek tugut be tilat u nanimbihidapmaŋak.” Unduŋ yobune Samaliyahi feedi Jesu nadisukilitimiŋgiŋ
doktiŋa uŋgoŋ hatidok niŋgiŋ kaŋ adut melenai lufom hatiguk.
Uŋoŋ hatiŋa gigitmede yenimbune metam noliyeŋ maaŋ nadisukilitimiŋgiŋ,
tiŋa tam u niŋgiŋ, “Koom du’walaŋ kahatge doktiŋa nadisukilitigumun, iŋgoŋ kobuk adi inde ne maŋiŋ gineŋ hinek mede foune nadihinakayam. Tiŋa adi biyagoŋ hinek kwetkwet hogohogok metam hatiyam indi’walaŋ Tubulodanik.”
Hele lufom dapmaune Jesu Galilide uguk.
Tiŋa Jesu ne koom indiŋ yoguk, “Polofet ne yolikwelineŋ adi nintiloloŋ mu tiiŋ.”
Iŋgoŋ Galili wosuwaune metam adi koom Jelusalem uŋoŋ Aŋelodi Yabukiyondaaŋ Yalakapmegukdok hinamuni nai foloŋ bopneune Bepaŋ kunumneniŋ’walaŋ kudi mebimebi tubu kagiŋ doktiŋa uŋoŋ uune niutumbagiŋ.
Kaŋ Jesu adi kotigoŋ Kanade uguk. Adi koom yokwet uŋoŋ mede yobune imedi wain mintaguk. Ala uŋoŋ uune kiyap niŋ adi mihiŋiŋ niŋ yagit kisaŋ hinek tiŋa Kafanaum uŋoŋ hakuk.
Ala adi Jesu Judiya kwet agaŋ bikabuŋa Galili kwetneŋ wosuwaguk nadiŋa wooŋ kaŋ indiŋ ninadiguk, “Mihine kumuŋ tibe tilak ale kedembe wooŋ tubukedebaweŋ?”
Unduŋ ninadiguk kaŋ Jesudibo niŋguk, “Hidi adi nadisukiliti tifit tifit mu tiiŋ. Adi nemek kudi folooŋ u dauhikdigoŋ kaŋ medene nadisukilitinamiiŋ.”
Unduŋ yobune kiyapdibo niŋguk, “Wapum, mihine agaŋ kumumbe tilak ale fiit buune udim.”
Unduŋ nimbune Jesudibo yoguk, “Kedem ale weŋ. Mihige agaŋ kedebaŋak.” Unduŋ nimbune me u Jesu medeŋiŋ nadisukilitiŋa udaneeŋ uguk.
Talipmeŋ ulune tipilapilaye mihiŋiye adi mede tiŋa buŋa tubumintaaŋ niŋgiŋ, “Mihige agaŋ kedebaguk.”
Unduŋ nimbune adibo yeninadiguk, “Maŋgoŋ nai foloŋ kedebaguk?” Yeninadiguk kaŋ “Kwe 1 kilok tebele kedebaguk,” niŋgiŋ.
Kaŋ me u Jesudi nai uŋaniŋgoŋ hinek, “Mihige agaŋ kedebaŋak” niŋguk u naditomguk. Tiŋa ne’walaŋ naŋgat dikiŋiye eŋ adut itougiŋ adi wanaŋ Jesu nadisukilitimiŋgiŋ.
Jesudi Judiya kwetneŋniŋ udaneeŋ Galili buŋa kudi u tubune nai lufom tuguk.
Unduŋ tiŋa hatigene Judame heki’walaŋ gulet wapum niŋ dulaune Jesu adi Jelusalemde loguk.
Uŋoŋ looŋ yeme niŋ wou Dompa Yeme gagayeŋ uŋoŋ imeguŋguŋ niŋ hatuguk wou Betesida. Ala imeguŋguŋ gagayeŋ walanda kohofukuŋ tigiŋ.
Ala uŋoŋ metam yagithinit feedi deihakagiŋ. Yagit indihi: dauhik sipmakahi, kayohik kumuhi eŋ foloohik gweheyehi. Undihidi ime mede tobune nadiŋa fofoŋdok woom hakagiŋ ala Wapum’walaŋ aŋelo niŋdi nai indigoŋ imeŋgwaŋ gineŋ fooŋ ime utoluguk. Utolune nediyeŋ nadiŋa timeŋ foluguk adi yagitŋiŋ kedebaluguk.
Nai uŋaniŋ me niŋ folooŋ kumuŋ tubu hatibune gulet 38 wondok tuwot tuguk.
Adi uŋgoŋ deihatu Jesudi wooŋ kaŋ yagit u tihatibu gulet unduŋ dapmalak u agaŋ nadiŋa indiŋ ninadiguk, “Du maaŋbe kedebawe nadilaŋ?”
Unduŋ ninadiune me kada yendi niŋguk, “Wapum, nedi mehinetneyeŋ adi ime mede tobu nadiŋa nanagila ime gineŋ nehifulawek? Moŋ doktiŋa na fowit yo nadilat iŋgoŋ nolidi nalakapmeeŋ foiŋ.”
Unduŋ yobune Jesudibo niŋguk, “Pilali gulupge ulaŋa weŋ.”
Nimbune nai uŋaniŋgoŋ me u kedebaaŋ pilali gulupŋiŋ ulaŋa uguk.
Bepaŋ’walaŋ kudi u Sabat nai foloŋ tuguk kaŋ Judame heki’walaŋ talitimeŋdi me kedeba tuguk u kaŋ niŋgiŋ, “Kamiŋ adi Sabat kaŋ Yodoko Medenikdi kwanai mu titiŋdok yolak iŋgoŋ du deti gulupge ulaŋa bulaŋ?”
Niŋgiŋ kaŋ adibo yoguk, “Me nehitubu-kedeba tiŋakdi gulupne ulaŋa uuŋdok naniŋak doktiŋa ulaŋa bulat.”
Yoguk kaŋ ninadigiŋ, “Me wou neeŋdi ganimbu tilaŋ?”
Ninadigiŋ iŋgoŋ metam fee yalu Jesu adi baŋamhik gineŋ wooŋ uguk doktiŋa nediyeŋ tubukedebaŋak u mu nadiguk.
Unduŋ tiŋa kougoŋ Jesudi me kedeba tuguk u Siloŋyot wawalineŋ kaŋ niŋguk, “Agaŋ kedebaŋaŋ ala tigene malabumuŋ wapum kotigoŋ mintagambaakneŋ doktiŋa kadakaniŋ kotigoŋ mu tuluwaaŋ.”
Unduŋ nimbune me u Jesu nai uŋaniŋ kadakaleeŋ wooŋ Judame heki’walaŋ talitimeŋ indiŋ yeniŋguk, “Me nehitubu-kedebaŋak wou Jesu.”
Unduŋ yenimbune kwihita tiŋa Jesu Sabat foloŋ tubukedeba kwanai tilak yoŋa mik timine tigiŋ.
Kaŋ Jesudi yeniŋguk, “Batne adi kwanai tomboyoutnit tilak doktiŋa nu maaŋ undugoŋ tilat.”
Mede u yenimbune Judame heki’walaŋ talitimeŋ adi nadiŋa agaŋ ulukumuŋdok welehik yout tuguk. U Sabat foloŋ kwanai tuguk wondok hogok moŋ, adi Bepaŋ u ne’niŋ beu hinek yoguk wondoktiŋa Judahi’walaŋ talitimeŋ heki adi nadiune Jesu adi Bepaŋ dut wanawanaŋ tamuk yobune ulukumune yogiŋ.
Unduŋ yogiŋ kaŋ Jesudi indiŋ tubu-udaneeŋ yeniŋguk, “Nu biyagoŋ hinek hanimbe nadineŋ. Mihi adi ne nadinadiŋiŋ gineŋ nemenemek hogohogok tuwot mu tibek. Baŋdi tubune kaŋ tilak. Adi dediŋ tilak undugoŋ hinek Mihidi maaŋ tilak.
Tiŋa Baŋ adi weleŋdi hinek Mihiŋiŋ kahilelak doktiŋa nemenemek ne tilak u Mihiŋiŋ nimbune kadapmalak. Tiŋa nemenemek i kaiŋ hogok moŋ. Kougoŋ wapum hinek tubune hidi kaŋ boho tineeŋ.
Eŋ Baŋdi me kumuŋ gineniŋ yehitubu-pilali hatihati yemulak undugoŋ hinek Mihidi adi be adi tubupilali hatihati mimbe nadiŋa kedem tibetik.
Be Baŋdi metam kibikoŋdok mede mu yenindapmalak, kwanai u adi Mihi kohoŋ gineŋ kameguk.
Unduŋ tubune metam adi Baŋ nintiloiŋ undugoŋ Mihi maaŋ nintiloneeŋ. Unduŋ doktiŋa nebek niŋ Baŋdi Mihi kameu buguk u mu nintilolak adi yadi Baŋ maaŋ mu nintilolak.
“Biyagoŋ hinek hanimbe nadineŋ: Nebek niŋdi medene nadidahiŋa me napmeune bugut u nadisukilitimilak adi indidegoŋ hatihati fafaŋeŋ u kahilelak. Tiŋa adi kibikoŋdok gigit mu tiŋa kumuŋ sigilulum timiŋa hatihati fafaŋeŋdok gigit tibaak.
Tiŋa indiŋ maaŋ nadineŋ: Nai niŋ agaŋ dulalak, uŋaniŋ kumuŋhinitdi Bepaŋ Mihiŋiŋ’walaŋ medeŋiŋ nadiŋa nadidahi tineŋ heki adi hatihati kahileneeŋ.
U Baŋdi hatihati diniŋ mebi tilak undugoŋ Mihidi hatihati diniŋ mebi titiŋdok yo nindapmaguk.
Adi Me Kobumuŋ hatilak doktiŋa metam’walaŋ mede yodapmaŋdok saŋiniŋ miŋa nindapmaguk.
Hidi mede u nadiŋa boho mu tineŋ. Nai niŋ mintawaakneŋ me kumuŋ tigiŋ, meyotneŋ hakiiŋ adi Mihi’walaŋ kutikutiŋiŋ u nadiŋa piladapmaneeŋ.
Me titiŋ kedem tigiŋ adi hatihati kahilenene pilatneeŋ, eŋ kadakaniŋ tigiŋ adi pilalune kadakaniŋhikdok kibikoŋ yenindapmawaak.”
“Nu na’walaŋ nadinadine gineŋ kwanai i tuwot mu tibit. Me napmeune bugut adi’walaŋ mede keleeŋ mede yodapmandapmaŋ kwanai tilat. Tiŋa undugoŋ na’walaŋ nadinadine mu takalilat. Moŋ. Me napmeune bugut adi’walaŋ nadinadi takalilat doktiŋa kwanai u didimeŋgoŋ hinek tilat.
Eŋ nu na mebine yodakalewit adi nadiune folooŋnit mokit tibek.
Unduŋ doktiŋa me niŋdi mebine kedem yodakalelak. Unduŋ yobune nu me weŋ’walaŋ mede nadiwe folooŋnit tilak.
Hidi Jon ninadigiŋ kaŋ adi mede biyagoŋ hinek hanindakaleguk. Nu kwetfoloŋ meeniŋdi mebine hanindakaledok mu nadiŋa yolat. Adi hide hatihati talik gineŋ yaliŋa hatidok yoŋa hanilat.
Jon adi kamaŋ dabugoŋ hautaguk kaŋ hidi hautaŋiŋ u nai muniniŋ-kabe kagalikaaŋ hatigiŋ.
Jon adi nutok mede biyagoŋ yoguk. Kaŋ nemek niŋ maaŋ Jon’walaŋ mede kalakapmeeŋ mebine miŋgoŋ hinek yodakalelak. Woŋ adi Baŋdi kwanaiŋiŋ tubudapmandok naniŋkulu fooŋ kwanaiŋiŋ tibe folooŋ mintaune Baŋdi napmeune fogut u miŋgoŋ mintadakalelak.
Tiŋa me Baŋ napmeu bugut ne maaŋ mebine yobihitak. Hidi adi’walaŋ maŋiŋ medeŋiŋ mu nadiiŋ be namanda maaŋ mu kaiŋ.
Tiŋa hidi me kameune buguk adi’walaŋ medeŋiŋ nadihaŋinda tiiŋ doktiŋa medeŋiŋ welehik maaneŋ mu hatak.
Hidi Youkudip Mede gineŋ hatihati fafaŋeniŋ kamehebigiŋ u kahileneem yoŋa hati kunatnadiiŋ, u nu iŋakoŋ.
Iŋgoŋ hidi yadi nu’walaŋkade buŋa hatihati kahiledok yo hanilat iŋgoŋ fiit mu nadiiŋ.
“Nu adi kwetfoloŋ metamdi naniutumba titiŋdok mu nadilat.
Tiŋa hidi Bepaŋ welehikdigoŋ hinek mu kahileiŋ u mebihik agaŋ nadilat.
Nu adi Baŋ’walaŋ maŋiŋ mede tagimneeŋ fogut iŋgoŋ hidi fiit mu nadinamiiŋ. Iŋgoŋ me niŋ ne nadinadiŋiŋde buŋa haniliwek binek adi nadimiyaneŋ.
Hidi Bepaŋ’walaŋ youtumba mu nadiŋa kwetfoloŋ me dut kiniutumba titiŋdok hogok nadiiŋ, hidi undihidi deti nadisukilitineŋ?
“Tiŋa hidi indiŋ mu nadineŋ. Nu me Baŋ’walaŋ namanda foloŋ mede gineŋ haniŋkadaka tibaat. Nu adi moŋ. Mosesdi tibaak. Hidi adi’walaŋkade ulolokeneyam yoŋa tibitaŋ tiiŋ doktiŋa ne haniŋkadakawaak.
Adi nutok mede uŋakoŋ youkuk doktiŋa hidi Moses’walaŋ mede biyagoŋ nadisukilitimine tigiŋ binek nu maaŋ nadisukilitinamaneŋ.
Iŋgoŋ hidi Moses’walaŋ mede mu nadisukilitiiŋdi nu mede yolat u deti nadisukilitineŋ.”
Hatigene heleniŋ Jesu Galili Imeŋgwaŋ (Taibiliya yoyagiŋ) fokolok loguk.
Kaŋ metam fee hinekdi yagithinit yehitubu-kedebau kayagiŋ doktiŋa keleeŋ ugiŋ.
Kaŋ Jesu adi mihiŋiye yahaŋeeŋ kweboboe foloŋ looŋ ikiŋ.
Nai uŋaniŋ Aŋelodi Yabukiyondaaŋ Yalakapmegukdok hinamuni titiŋdok nai dulaguk.
Kaŋ Jesu adi ila kaune metam fee hinek bulune yabuŋa Filip niŋguk, “Metam i nanaŋe daŋ tuwayemne naneŋ?”
Jesu adi kougoŋ dediŋ tibek u agaŋ nadiŋa hogok niŋkamanda tuguk.
Unduŋ ninadiguk kaŋ Filipdibo yoguk, “Metam hogohogok i yemtoidok nadiŋa 200 Kina unduŋdi nanaŋe tuwanim iŋgoŋ wendi tuwot mu tibek.”
Unduŋ yobune Jesu mihiŋiŋ niŋ Saimon Pita kwayaŋ, wou Endulu, adibo yoguk,
“Mihi niŋ adi belet yawe kohofukuŋ (5) eŋ pisi lufomuk moŋgo buŋak, iŋgoŋ metam hogohogok yendi u naaŋ natokineŋdok tuwot moŋ.”
Unduŋ yobune Jesudi yeniŋguk, “Metam yenimbu kilihikit momooŋ foloŋ fo itneŋ.” Unduŋ yenimbu metam hogohogok kilihikit momooŋ haliugukneŋ uŋgoŋ fooŋ ilaugiŋ. Mewoi hogok diniŋ kunakunathik 5 tausen tuguk.
Foilaugiŋ kaŋ Jesudi belet tiŋa Bepaŋ niutumbaaŋ wobuŋa metam uŋoŋ ilaugiŋ hogohogok yembu nagiŋ kaŋ pisi maaŋ moŋgola undugoŋ tuguk kaŋ metamdi naaŋ tuwot tigiŋ.
Kaŋ mihiŋiye yeniŋguk, “Nanaŋe diki ila kadaka tineneŋ doktiŋa moŋgo boineŋ.”
Unduŋ yenimbune belet yawe kohofukuŋ (5) yemguk diniŋ nadikidiki moŋgola bondibondi 12 kadahitokogiŋ.
Bepaŋ kunumneniŋ’walaŋ kudi u tubune kaŋ metamdi yogiŋ, “O, biyagoŋ hinek me yoŋ adi Polofet kwetfoloŋ fofoŋdok yogiŋ iŋakoŋ.”
Metamdi unduŋ yoŋa honeeŋ mapmehik kambiyatdok yoŋa tigiŋ. Kaŋ Jesudi u yabukiyondaaŋ momoŋ kweboboe foloŋ ne hogok loguk.
Kwet tebele dalune Jesu mihiŋiye adi kotigoŋ ime magineŋ foŋ
muwagehik foloŋ looŋ ime meŋeŋa Kafanaumde udaneeŋ une tigiŋ. Iŋgoŋ kwet mambip tubune Jesu adi mu foguk doktiŋa nehi hogok ugiŋ.
Kiŋ gineniŋ tububihila wooŋ ime lekiŋgoŋ u kunakunat fek 6 kilomita wondok tuwot ulune fifiŋgobut kisaŋ tiŋa ime tubugiyondaguk.
Unduŋ tubune Jesu adi imetabe foloniŋgoŋ yalitabuŋa muwage tubudulalune mihiŋiye adi kaŋ munta tigiŋ.
Kaŋ Jesudi yeniŋguk, “Nagoŋ bulat ale munta mu tineŋ!”
Unduŋ yenimbune adi nadiŋa nagila muwage foloŋ kameu looŋ ilune nai uŋaniŋgoŋ kwet daŋ une ugiŋneŋ wosuwagiŋ.
Metam nanaŋe naaŋ uŋgoŋ deikiŋdi heleune pilali indiŋ yogiŋ, “Kwe muwage kubugoŋ hogok yalu kagumun. U mihiŋiyedi Jesu iŋgoŋ bikabuŋa nehi hogok ugiŋ.”
Unduŋ ha yolu Taibiliyahi noli adi muwagehik foloŋ buŋa heleŋ nanaŋe nagiŋ uŋgoŋ wosuwagiŋ.
Kaŋ metamdi Jesu tiŋa mihiŋiye uŋoŋ yolohigiŋ moŋ kaŋ Taibiliyahi’walaŋ muwage foloŋ looŋ Kafanaumde wooŋ uŋoŋbo lohigiŋ.
Metam adi wooŋ Jesu ime fokolok tubumintaaŋ niŋgiŋ, “Hinale, du deniŋ buŋaŋ?”
Ninadigiŋ kaŋ yeniŋguk, “Nu mebihik a nadilat. Hidi Bepaŋ’walaŋ kudi tugut wendoktiŋa mu nolohiiŋ. Hidi adi belet naaŋ tuwot tigiŋ wendoktiŋa nolohiiŋ.
Hidi nanaŋe kwetfoloŋ liwewaak wendok kwanai hogok mu tiyaneeŋ, adi hatihati fafaŋeŋ diniŋ nanaŋedok kwanaiŋiŋ maaŋ tiyaneeŋ. Baŋ Bepaŋdi Me Kobumuŋdok nadimimbune uŋgoniŋ hinek tilak doktiŋa hidi adi’walaŋkade uune hatihati diniŋ nanaŋe kedem hamuluwaak.”
Unduŋ yeniŋguk kaŋ adibo indiŋ ninadigiŋ, “Indi dediŋ tiŋa Bepaŋ’walaŋ kwanai tinim?”
Unduŋ ninadigiŋ kaŋ adibo yeniŋguk, “Me niŋkulu buguk adi nadisukilitimineŋ. U adi Bepaŋ’walaŋ kwanai hinek uŋakoŋ.”
Yeniŋguk kaŋ niŋgiŋ, “Unda, du nemek Bepaŋ kunumneniŋ’walaŋ kudi neeŋ tubune kaŋ indi kedem nadisukilitigamnim. Koom mamani-papaniye adi kwet fiileŋ mana nagiŋ wendoktiŋa Yodoko Mededi indiŋ yolak, ‘Adi nanaŋe kunum gineniŋ yembu nayagiŋ.’”
Unduŋ yogiŋ kaŋ Jesudibo yeniŋguk, “Biyagoŋ hinek hanilat, Mosesdi kunum gineniŋ nanaŋe mamahi-papahiyedok mu yemguk. Kunum gineniŋ nanaŋe folooŋ hinek adi Batnedi hamulak.
Bepaŋ’walaŋ nanaŋe folooŋ hinek adi kunum gineniŋ fooŋ kwetfoloŋ me hatihati tubumintahamulak.”
Unduŋ yeniŋguk kaŋ niŋgiŋ, “Wapum, nanaŋe u helemahelemaŋ nimbu nayaneem.”
Niŋgiŋ kaŋ Jesudibo yeniŋguk, “Hatihati diniŋ nanaŋe adi nu. Unduŋ doktiŋa nebek niŋ nu’walaŋkade buluwaak adi yadi map mu tuluwaak, eŋ nebek niŋdi nu nadisukiliti-namuluwaak adi yadi maŋiŋ mu galiwaak.
Ale i nadineŋ, hidi nu nabiiŋ iŋgoŋ nabukabeleeŋ mu nadisukilitinamiiŋ.
Nu kunum gineniŋ fooŋ na’walaŋ nadinadine mu keleeŋ kwanai i tilat. Baŋ’walaŋ nadinadi kelelat doktiŋa metam nedigoŋ Baŋdi nutok namulak adi nu’walaŋkade buune sigilulum mu tiyemiluwaat.
Tiŋa Batne’walaŋ nadinadiŋiŋ adi indiŋ: me nedigoŋ nutok namguk adi fitneeneŋ doktiŋa yabudokooŋ yehibopneeŋ hatigene nai wapum gineŋ wanakaŋ hinek yehitubu-pilalaat.
Unduŋ doktiŋa Batne adi indiŋ nadilak: me nediyeŋ Mihi nadisukilitimiiŋ adi yadi hatihati fafaŋeŋdok gigit tineeŋ. Kaŋ nu nai wapum gineŋ yehitubu-pilalaat.”
Jesu adi “Nu kunumneniŋ nanaŋe fogut” unduŋ yoguk doktiŋa Judame heki adi nadikadakaaŋ toŋgiyonda tiŋa indiŋ yogiŋ,
“Me yadi a nadimiyam. Adi Josep mihiŋiŋ. Miŋbeu agaŋ nadiyemam iŋgoŋ dediŋ doktiŋa kunum gineniŋ fogut yolak.”
Unduŋ yogiŋ kaŋ Jesudi yeniŋguk, “Hidi mede wendok nadikadaka mu tineŋ.
Nebek niŋ adi ne’walaŋ nadinadiŋiŋde nu’walaŋkade tuwot mu bek. Adi Baŋdi tubulodaune kedem bek, kaŋ nai wapum gineŋ tubupilalaat.
Polofet hekidi mede indiŋ youkiŋ, ‘Bepaŋ ne metam hogohogok u yenindidimewaak.’ Unduŋ doktiŋa nebek niŋ Baŋ’walaŋ mede nadiŋa nadidahi tilak adi nu’walaŋkade bulak.
Nebek niŋdi Batne nemu kaguk. Bepaŋ’walaaniŋ buguk ne hogok kaguk.
“Biyagoŋ hinek hanilat. Nu adi hatihati fafaŋeniŋ diniŋ nanaŋe doktiŋa nebek niŋdi nu nadisukilitinambaak adi hatihati fafaŋeniŋ kahilewaak.
Koom mamani-papaniyedi mana kwet fiileŋ nagiŋ iŋgoŋ fiit kumuŋ tigiŋ,
eŋ nanaŋe kunum gineniŋ foguk adi naaŋ kumuŋ mu titiŋdok u nu iŋakoŋ.
Nanaŋe hatihatinit kunum gineniŋ foguk u nu, ala nebek niŋdi nanaŋe u nawaak adi hatitawooŋ hatibaak. Foloonedi nanaŋe folooŋ tilak u metamdi hatihati tubumintadok hambaat.”
Judahi adi mede u nadiŋa kisaŋ hinek kwihitaaŋ yogiŋ, “Me i ne’walaŋ gomŋiŋ deti nimbune nanim yo yolak?”
Unduŋ yogiŋ kaŋ Jesudi yeniŋguk, “Biyagoŋ hinek hanimbe nadineŋ, hidi Me Kobumuŋ’walaŋ gom naŋgat u mu naneeŋ adi hatihatinit mokit hatineeŋ.
Nebek niŋ nu’walaŋ gomne eŋ naŋgatne naluwaak adi yadi hatihati fafaŋeŋ kahilewaak, kaŋ nu nai wapum gineŋ tubupilalaat.
Nu’walaŋ gomne adi nanaŋe hinek eŋ naŋgatne adi ime hinek doktiŋa yolat.
Unduŋ doktiŋa nebek niŋdi nu’walaŋ gomne eŋ naŋgatne nalak adi yadi nukut hatilak kaŋ nu adut hatilat.
Me Baŋ hatihati molomdi napmeu fogut doktiŋa nu kaipmuŋ hatilat. Undugoŋ hinek nebek niŋdi gomne eŋ naŋgatne nalak adi yadi kaipmuŋ hatiluwaak.
Nanaŋe kunum gineniŋ foguk diniŋ mebi indiŋ. Koom mamani-papaniye adi mana nagiŋ iŋgoŋ fiit kumuŋ tigiŋ, eŋ nebek niŋdi nanaŋe i nawaak adi hatihati fafaŋeŋ kahilewaak.”
Jesudi Kafanaum uŋoŋ Judahi’walaŋ bopyotneŋ hatiŋa mede i yenindidimeguk.
Metam keleyau tagiŋ adi’walahi feedi mede i nadiŋa indiŋ yogiŋ, “Mede i nadine malabumuŋ hinek tilak doktiŋa nediyeŋ nadiwek.”
Mede u yolakata tigiŋ kaŋ Jesudi welehik maaneŋ u kaŋ yeniŋguk, “Hidi mede i nadiune welehik maaneŋ tuwot mube tilak?
Kaŋ Me Kobumuŋ udaneeŋ kunum gineŋ loune hidi kaŋ dediŋ nadineeŋ!
Siginikdi kwanai tilak adi hatihatinit mokit. Kaŋ Munabulidi kwanai tilak adi hatihati folooŋ tubumintanimilak. Unduŋ doktiŋa mede i hanilat adi Munabulinit eŋ hatihatinit.
Iŋgoŋ noli hidi nadisukiliti mu tiiŋ.” (Jesu adi nediyeŋ nadisukiliti mu timineeŋ be memik heki’walaŋ kohohik foloŋ kameneeŋ u agaŋ koom yabukiyondaaŋ nadiguk doktiŋa mede u yeniŋguk.)
“Unduŋ doktiŋa indiŋ haniŋat, me nedigoŋ niŋ Baŋdi mu tubulodaune adi yadi nu’walaŋkade bubuŋdok tuwot moŋ.”
Mede unduŋ yenimbu metam feedi Jesu keleyawagiŋ adi uŋoŋ hatidok lakata tiŋa sigilulum timiŋa ugiŋ.
Kaŋ Jesudi u yabuŋa mihiŋiye 12 yeninadiguk, “Kaŋ hidi maaŋbe binabuŋa une tiiŋ?”
Unduŋ yoguk kaŋ Saimon Pitadi niŋguk, “Wapum, du dagoŋ hatihati diniŋ mede ninilaŋ kaŋ indi du bigabuŋa neeŋ’walaŋkade unim yoŋa nininadilaŋ?
Tiŋa indi du Bepaŋ’walaŋ me uŋgoniŋ hinek u agaŋ nadiŋa nadisukilitiyam.”
Unduŋ yobune Jesudi indiŋ tubu-udaneyemguk, “Me 12 hidi nagoŋ habudakaleeŋ hanagikut iŋgoŋ hidi’walaaniŋ niŋ adi yabap kadakaniŋ.”
Mede u Judas Kaliotniŋ, Saimon mihiŋiŋdok yoguk. Judas adi Jesu ne mihiŋiŋ niŋ uŋakoŋ iŋgoŋ kougoŋ Jesu memik heki kohohik foloŋ kamewaak doktiŋa yoguk.
Jesu adi mede unduŋ yobune Judame heki’walaŋ me wapuhi Judiya kwetneŋ utne yogiŋ doktiŋa adi uŋoŋ mu yauŋa Galili kwetneŋ hogok hatiluguk.
Judahi’walaŋ Yoholaŋ diniŋ hinamuni nai wapum dulaune
Jesu kwayaŋiyedi nintifo mede indiŋ niŋgiŋ, “Metam fee Judiya kwetneŋ uneŋ doktiŋa du maaŋ fooŋ kudi iŋoŋ tilaŋ u tubune metamgeyedi kaneŋ.
Me niŋ adi wou miŋgoŋ mintadakaledok nadiŋa kaŋ adi kwanai kabup mu tilak. Du kwanai unduŋ tilaŋ doktiŋa Judiya kwetneŋ wooŋ mintadakaleeŋ tubune gabuneŋbe?”
Kwayaŋiye adi mu nadisukilitimiŋgiŋ doktiŋa mede unduŋ niŋgiŋ.
Unduŋ yogiŋ kaŋ Jesudibo yeniŋguk, “Hidi nai fifit indigoŋ hinamuni titiŋdok une nadiŋa kedem une tiŋit. Iŋgoŋ nu’walaŋ nai mu dulalak.
Kwetfoloŋ metam adi hidi habukwihita mu tiiŋ eŋ nu adigili titiŋhik be hatihatihik hogoli u yohautalat doktiŋa nabukwihita tiiŋ.
Kedem ale hidi hinamunide uneŋ, kaŋ nu adi naine hinek mu dulalak doktiŋa hidut mu wit.”
Unduŋ yeniŋa Galili kwetneŋ uŋgoŋ hatiguk.
Unduŋ yenimbu adi timeŋ ugiŋ kaŋ adi mindaŋ kabukabup uguk.
Kaŋ hinamuni nai tubune Judame heki’walaŋ me wapuhi adi Jesu lohiŋa yogiŋ, “Me u maaŋbe buŋak?”
Unduŋ yobune metam feedi lekiŋgoŋhik gineŋ aditok mede kiyonadi tigiŋ, tiŋa nolidi yogiŋ, “Adi yadi me momooŋ,” eŋ nolidi yogiŋ, “Moŋ, adi yadi metam nadinadihik tubugiyonda tilak.”
Unduŋ yohakene adi’walaaniŋ nebek niŋdi Judahi talitimeŋ heki namandahik gineŋ Jesudok mede yodok munta tiŋa wabi tigiŋ.
Jesu adi kabukabup hatitawooŋ hinamuni nai lekiŋgoŋ tulune Siloŋyot walanda foloŋ looŋ metam yenindidimeguk.
Kaŋ Judame talitimeŋ heki adi kaŋ boho tiŋa yogiŋ, “Me i indut nadinadi yotneŋ nemu foguk iŋgoŋ deti buŋa Bepaŋ’walaŋ mede mebi hinek utawaŋ yolak.”
Unduŋ yogiŋ kaŋ Jesudi yeniŋguk, “Nu mede yohauta tilat u na’walaŋ kwanai mu tilat. Me napmeune bugut adi’walaŋ kwanai tilat.
Nebek niŋdi Bepaŋ’walaŋ mede nadilak adi mede yolat u Bepaŋ’walaaniŋ be na’walaaniŋ mintalak u kedem nadidakalewek.
Nebek niŋ ne’walaŋ nadinadi gineŋ be ne’walaŋ saŋiniŋ gineŋ kwanai tilak adi ne’walaŋ wougigit mintawekdok tilak. Eŋ niŋ adi kwanai molomdok youtumba mintadok kwanai tilak adi me didimeniŋ. Mede biyagoŋ hogok yolak.
Moses adi Yodoko Mede haniŋguk iŋgoŋ hidi’walaaniŋ niŋdi nemu kelelak. Kaŋ hidi maŋgoŋde nulukumune tiiŋ?”
Unduŋ yoguk kaŋ metamdibo yogiŋ, “Nediyeŋ gulukumumbe tilak? Yabapdi be fogambu mede unduŋ yobubuyelaŋ.”
Unduŋ yogiŋ kaŋ Jesudibo yeniŋguk, “Nu Bepaŋ kunumneniŋ’walaŋ kudi Sabat foloŋ tibe kaŋ yonadibedi tiiŋ.
Hidi mihihiye’walaŋ sigihik gitnem diki foloŋ fek tiyemiiŋ u adi Mosesdi mu tububihikuk. U adi koom Bepaŋdi Abalaham heki yenimbune tububihila tigiŋ. Iŋgoŋ hidi Mosesdi nimiŋak yoŋa Sabat foloŋ maaŋ tiiŋ.
Unduŋ doktiŋa hidi Moses’walaŋ Yodoko Mede lahulu folooŋnit mokit tibaakneŋ yoŋa Sabat foloŋ mihihiye’walaŋ sigihik gineŋ fek tiiŋ iŋgoŋ Sabat foloŋ me niŋ tubukedebagut kaŋ maŋgoŋde kwihita tinamiiŋ?
Hidi mede yone kaŋ dauhikdi hogok mu kaŋ yoyaneeŋ. Mede mebi nadidakale hinek tiŋa yoyaneeŋ.”
Jelusalemhi metam nolidi Jesu kaŋ yogiŋ, “Me wapuhiniyedi me uutdok yo tiiŋ iŋakoŋ binek?
Iŋgoŋ deti adi metam bop wapum gineŋ mede miŋgoŋ yali yolak kaŋ me talitimeŋ heki kamehep mu timiiŋ. Be adi Kilisto bidak yoŋa bikabiiŋ?
Unduŋ iŋgoŋ u maaŋ moŋ. Kilisto baak kaŋ mebiŋiŋ be yolikweli u mu nadidakaleneem, iŋgoŋ me yoŋ adi mintamintaŋiŋ kwet agaŋ nadiyam.”
Siloŋyot walanda foloŋ yaliŋa metam yayenindidimelune nadiŋa mede hamahamap unduŋ yonadigiŋ, kaŋ Jesudi yabunadiŋa indiŋ kutifiyeeŋ yeniŋguk, “Ai! Hidi na be, be mintaminta kwetne u agaŋ nadinamiiŋ. Iŋgoŋ nu adi na nadinadinede mu fogut. Mede biyagoŋ Molom adi napmeu fogut, iŋgoŋ hidi adi mu nadimiiŋ.
Nu yadi adi’walaaniŋ, tiŋa ne napmeune bugut doktiŋa nu agaŋ nadimilat.”
Unduŋ yenimbune honeeŋ ulukumuŋdok nadigiŋ iŋgoŋ naiŋiŋ mu dulaguk doktiŋa kohohik malabudaune bikabugiŋ.
Iŋgoŋ metam fee adi nai uŋaniŋ nadisukilitimiŋa yogiŋ, “Kilisto baak adi me yendi Bepaŋ’walaŋ kudi tilak u kalakapmeŋ tibaak bidak? Moŋ. Adi nemenemek hogohogok agaŋ tubudapmalak.”
Falisi heki adi metamdi Jesudok mede hamahamap yogiŋ u nadiŋa me Siloŋyot diniŋ talitimeŋ wapuhi yeniŋa wanaŋ mikme yapmeune Jesu nagitne ugiŋ.
Kaŋ Jesudi yeniŋguk, “Nu hidut iŋoŋ muniniŋ-kabe hatiŋa me napmeune bugut’walaŋ udaneeŋ waat.
Kaŋ hidi nu waatneŋ uŋoŋ tuwot mu uneeŋ doktiŋa nolohineeŋ iŋgoŋ mu nehitubu-mintaneeŋ.”
Unduŋ yeniŋguk kaŋ Judame heki’walaŋ me wapuhi nehi uŋgoŋ indiŋ yonadigiŋ, “Daŋgoŋ uune indi mu kaneem doktiŋa unduŋ yolak. Notniye noli Gilik kwetneŋ itowiiŋ wooŋ yenindidimewe bidak yolak.
Adi indiŋ yolak, ‘Indi lohineem iŋgoŋ tuwot mu tubumintaneem be adi waakneŋ indi tuwot mu uneem.’ U mebi dediŋdok yolak?”
Hinamuni nai wapum dapmandapmande metam fee bopneune Jesudi pilali yali mede gibitaŋ indiŋ yohautaguk, “Nebek niŋdi imedok nadikaaŋ nu’walaŋkade buŋa ime nawek.
Adi nu nadisukilitinambek kaŋ Youkudip Mede yolak undugoŋ hinek ime naŋgat mu tilak u weleŋ maaneŋ mintamimbune hatiluwaak.”
Jesu adi Uŋgoniŋ Munabulidok nadiŋa mede u yeniŋguk. Nai uŋaniŋ Jesu kunum hautaŋiŋ gineŋ mu udaneeŋ loguk, doktiŋa metam nadisukilitimiŋgiŋ adi Uŋgoniŋ Munabulidi mu fotokoyemguk.
Metam noli adi mede u nadiŋa Jesudok indiŋ yogiŋ, “Biyagoŋ, adi polofetnik wapum.”
Eŋ nolidi yogiŋ “adi Kilisto kuyoŋ.” Kuŋgoŋ nolidi yogiŋ “dediŋ tiŋa Kilisto adi Galili kwetneŋ mintawe tiŋak.
Youkudip Mededi indiŋ yolak. Kilisto adi Dewit’walaŋ yolikwelineŋ Betelehem uŋoŋ mintawaak eŋ adi’walaŋ naŋgat dikiŋiye gineŋ mintawaak.”
Metam adi Jesudok unduŋ yoŋa nehi uŋgoŋ daneeŋ bop lufom tigiŋ.
Tiŋa nolidi honeeŋ nagi wooŋ yot fafaŋeniŋneŋ kameŋdok yo nadigiŋ iŋgoŋ nebek niŋdi nemu lodaaŋ honeguk.
Unduŋ tigiŋ kaŋ mikme hekidi udaneeŋ talitimeŋ wapuhi eŋ Falisi heki’walaŋ uune adi indiŋ yeninadigiŋ, “Hidi maŋgoŋde mu nagila biiŋ?”
Yeninadiune mikme heki adi indiŋ yeniŋgiŋ, “Adi mede yolak u kwetfoloŋ me niŋeŋ yobekdok tuwot moŋ.”
Yobune Falisi me heki adi indiŋ yeniŋtogiŋ, “Be hidi maaŋ wele tubufit tihamuŋak?
Me wapuhi be Falisi heki indi’walahi nebek adut neeŋbe wooŋ galiŋak?
Moŋ. Wa me hogohi Yodoko Mede mu nadidakaleiŋ adi hogok. Adi kuyeŋ hamdok gigit tineeŋ oŋ.”
Kaŋ me adi’walaaniŋ niŋ wou Nikodimas adi koom Jesu timiŋ wooŋ kaguk adi indiŋ yeniŋguk,
“Unda, hidi yoneŋ. Me niŋ adi mebiŋiŋ be kadakaniŋŋiŋ nemu kaŋ nadiŋa mede gineŋ hogok kamefit titiŋdok u Yodoko Mede gineŋ neeŋbe youkiŋ?”
Kaŋ noliŋiyedi yogiŋ, “Unda, du maaŋ Galiliniŋ binek? Youkudip Mede u baigoŋ kunali kaweŋ. Galili kwetneŋniŋ polofet nemu mintawaak.” [
Unduŋ tiŋa metam mowoŋa yohite ugiŋ.
kaŋ Jesu adi Oliwa Tuwai foloŋ loguk.
Ala heleune haniŋ kotigoŋ Siloŋyot walanda foloŋ wooŋ foune metamdi kisaŋ hinek buŋa adi yakukneŋ bopneune foila kotigoŋ Bepaŋ’walaŋ mede yenindidimeguk.
Bepaŋ’walaŋ mede ila yolune Yodoko Mede hinale tiŋa Falisi heki adi tam niŋ yohoinitdi kefifile tuguk u nagila buŋa metam namandahik gineŋ kameune yakuk.
Kameu yalune Jesu niŋgiŋ, “Tam i kefifile tiŋak kaŋ nagila bam.
Tiŋa Yodoko Medenik gineŋ Mosesdi tam undihi adi kawadedi widihikumuŋ titiŋdok yoguk. Ale du dediŋ nadilaŋ?”
Unduŋ ninadiune Jesudi dediŋ ya yobubuyeune mede gineŋ kameŋdok yoŋa niŋkamanda tigiŋ, iŋgoŋ Jesu adi duwokeneeŋ kohoŋdi kudi kwet gineŋ ha-youkuk.
Kaŋ uŋgoŋ yali nilu nilu Jesudibo pilali yeniŋguk, “Nebek hidi’walaaniŋ niŋdi kadakaniŋ-kabe nemu tuguk nadiŋa kaŋ kawade timeŋ kedem kula ulune tubulodaaŋ utneŋ.”
Unduŋ yeniŋa kotigoŋ duwokeneeŋ kohoŋdi kwet gineŋ kudi ila youkuk.
Kaŋ mede u nadiŋa gawadahidi timeŋ tiŋa uune metam kubugoŋ kubugoŋ diliteleeŋ wooŋ udapmagiŋ. Kaŋ tam u Jesu’walaŋ hebeŋ gineŋ ne hogok yalune
Jesudi pilali kaŋ ninadiguk, “Tam, metam i daŋ wiiŋ? Nebek niŋdi du mede gineŋ gapmeŋdok nemu be hatak?”
Kaŋ tamdibo niŋguk, “O Wapum, nemu hatak.” Nimbu yoguk, “Nu maaŋ kibikoŋdok mede mu ganimbit ale kedem weŋ. Wooŋ hatiŋa kadakaniŋ kotigoŋ mu tuluwaaŋ.” ]
Unduŋ tiŋa metam bu bopneune Jesudi mede kotigoŋ tomboyoula indiŋ yeniŋguk, “Nu adi kwetfoloŋ memetam’walaŋ hauta, doktiŋa nebek niŋdi nu nehikelewaak adi hatihati diniŋ hauta kahileeŋ mambip gineŋ mu hatiluwaak.”
Unduŋ yoguk kaŋ Falisi hekidibo niŋgiŋ, “I du dagoŋ mebige yodakalelaŋ doktiŋa medege u nadine folooŋnit mokit tilak.”
Yogiŋ kaŋ Jesudi yoguk, “Nu deŋandiniŋ bugut be deŋandiŋ waat u agaŋ nadilat, doktiŋa na mebine yodakalewe folooŋnit mokit mu tilak. Iŋgoŋ hidi adi nu deŋandiniŋ bugut be deŋandiŋ waat u mu nadiiŋ.
Tiŋa hidi yadi meeniŋ diniŋ mebihik me nadinadi talik foloŋ wahiŋgoŋ yoiŋ, iŋgoŋ nu adi unduŋ mu tilat.
Nu adi Baŋ napmeune bugut adi nehitubu-lodaune kwanai tilat doktiŋa nu titiŋhik be hatihatihik diniŋ mebi yodakalewe u biyagoŋ yolat tilak.
Hidi’walaŋ Yodoko Mede gineŋ mede indiŋ youkiŋ doktiŋa yolat, ‘Me lufomdi mede niŋdok kikasop tubune folooŋnit tibetik.’
Nu na’walaŋ mebine yodakalelat kaŋ Baŋ napmeune bugut adi maaŋ mebine yodakalelak.”
Unduŋ yeniŋguk kaŋ ninadigiŋ, “Kaŋ baha de?” Nimbune yeniŋguk, “Hidi na be, be Batne indi mu nadinimiiŋ. Iŋgoŋ nu nadinamaneŋ binek adi Batne maaŋ kedem nadimiyaneŋ.”
Jesudi Siloŋyot maaneŋ muneeŋ boiboi maliŋ ikiŋneŋ uŋoŋ yali mede u yenindidimeguk. Kaŋ honeeŋ uutdok nai mu dulaguk doktiŋa nebek niŋdi nemu honegiŋ.
Mede unduŋ yeniŋa kotigoŋ indiŋ yeniŋguk, “Nu hapmeeŋ waat kaŋ hidi nolohi tineeŋ, iŋgoŋ kadakaniŋhinit hati kumuneeŋ doktiŋa nu waatneŋ tuwot mu uneeŋ.”
Unduŋ yeniŋguk kaŋ Judahidi indiŋ yogiŋ, “Adi dediŋ nadiŋa mede unduŋ yolak? Ne sigiŋ bidak kule yolak.”
Yogiŋ kaŋ Jesudibo yeniŋguk, “Hidi adi kwetfoloŋ iŋahi eŋ nu adi kunumneniŋ fogut. Eŋ hidi kwetfoloŋhi eŋ nu adi kwetfoloŋniŋ moŋ.
Unduŋ doktiŋa indiŋ hanilat, hidi kadakaniŋhinit hati kumuneeŋ. Nu na iŋakoŋ mebine hanimbe mu nadisukilitiiŋ doktiŋa kadakaniŋhik uŋgoŋ hahambu kumuneeŋ kuyoŋ.”
Unduŋ yeniŋguk kaŋ niŋgiŋ, “Kaŋ du nedigoŋ?” Ninadiune yeniŋguk, “Agaŋ koom tububihit gineŋ haniŋgut.
Tiŋa nu adi hidi’walaŋ titiŋhik diniŋ mede yodapmaŋdok u tuwot boi hatat. Me napmeune bugut adi yadi mede biyagoŋ hinek yolak kaŋ nu maŋiŋ gineŋ nadiŋa kwetfoloŋ iŋoŋ yohautalat.”
Adi mede u Beudok yenimbune mu nadidakalegiŋ.
Unduŋ doktiŋa Jesudi tomboyoula indiŋ yeniŋguk, “Nu na nadinadine gineŋ kwanai i mu tilat. Baŋdi naniŋdidimeguk uŋakoŋ keleeŋ yolat. Doktiŋa hidi Me Kobumuŋ tiŋa looŋ tebiŋa nai uŋaniŋ mebine nadidakaleneeŋ be mede yolat u maaŋ nadidakaleneeŋ.
Me napmeu bugut adi nukut hatilak. Adi nemek tugut be tilat u kaune momooŋ tilak doktiŋa mu binabulak.”
Unduŋ yobune metam feedi mede u nadiŋa nadisukilitimiŋgiŋ.
Kaŋ Jesudi Judahi metam nadisukilitimiŋgiŋ u indiŋ yeniŋguk, “Hidi mede hanilat i keleeŋ hatineeŋ adi nu’walaŋ wapmihineye hinek tineeŋ.
Tiŋa nu’walaŋ mede biyagoŋ u nadidakaleune wendi folok gineniŋ hehifiyalune geyamnit mokit hatineeŋ.”
Unduŋ yenimbune niŋgiŋ, “Indi tipilapilaye kwanai tuwaŋit mokit nemu tugumun. Indi Abalaham me wapum’walaŋ yalakiŋiye, kaŋ du dediŋ doktiŋa folok gineniŋ nihifiyale yolaŋ?”
Yogiŋ kaŋ Jesudibo yeniŋguk, “Biyagoŋ hinek hanimbe nadineŋ. Metam hogohogok kadakaniŋ tiiŋ adi yadi kadakaniŋ diniŋ tipilapilaye kwanai tiiŋ.
Tiŋa tipilapilaye-me adi me wapumŋiŋ’walaŋ yolineŋ tomboyoutnit mu hatibetik. Eŋ mihiŋiŋ hinek adi beu’walaŋ yolineŋ helemahelemaŋ hatilak.
Unduŋ doktiŋa Mihi adi folok gineniŋ hehifiyalune biyagoŋ hinek folok gineŋ mu hatineeŋ.
“Hidi Abalaham’walaŋ yalaki u agaŋ nadilat iŋgoŋ medene mu nadiiŋ doktiŋa nulukumune yoiŋ.
Nu Batne’walaŋ nemek kanadigut uŋakoŋ yolat kaŋ hidi adi behikdi haniŋguk uŋakoŋ tiiŋ.”
Unduŋ yeniŋguk kaŋ niŋgiŋ, “Indi adi Abalaham’walaŋ wapmihiŋiye.” Yobune indiŋ yenintoguk, “Hidi Abalaham’walaŋ wapmihiŋiye yoiŋ iŋgoŋ dediŋ doktiŋa adi’walaŋ titiŋ u mu keleiŋ.
Adi Bepaŋ’walaŋ kwanai-me nemu ulukumuŋguk. Iŋgoŋ nu adi Bepaŋ’walaŋ mede biyagoŋ hinek nadigut u hanilat, kaŋ hidi nulukumune yoiŋ.
Hidi adi behikdi tilak uŋakoŋ keleiŋ.” Yeniŋguk kaŋ yogiŋ, “Indi betnik mokit hogok mintafit mu tugumun. Indi Betnik adi Bepaŋ kubugoŋ.”
Unduŋ yogiŋ kaŋ yeniŋguk, “Nu na nadinadinede mu fogut. Bepaŋdi napmeu fogut doktiŋa hidi Behik Bepaŋ u biyagoŋ binek nadiyaneŋ adi nu not tinamaneŋ.
Hidi dediŋ tiŋa hatibune medenedi welehik maaneŋ mu folak? Nu mede yolatneŋ magihik momooŋgoŋ mu kameeŋ nadiiŋ doktiŋa uŋakoŋ ya yoiŋ.
“Hidi adi Sadaŋ’walaŋ wapmihi doktiŋa behik’walaŋ nadinadi hogoli keleiŋ. Adi koomkwaha metam yehitubu-kadaka titabugukdi titabulak. Eŋ mede biyagoŋ u sigilulum timiŋguk doktiŋa weleŋ maaneŋ mede biyagoŋ nemu hatak. Adi yalaŋ molom doktiŋa yalaŋ mede yoyo wendi nanaŋe imeŋiŋ tilak.
Wendoktiŋa mede biyagoŋ hanilat u hidi medene mu nadisukilitinamiiŋ.
Hidi’walaaniŋ niŋdi kedembe nu kadakaniŋ tugut u nanimbek? U tuwot moŋ, kaŋ dediŋ doktiŋa mede biyagoŋ u hanilat kaŋ medene mu nadisukilitinamiiŋ?
Niŋ adi Bepaŋdok gigit hatilakdi medeŋiŋ nadilak. Hidi adi’walahi moŋ doktiŋa medeŋiŋ mu nadimiiŋ.”
Mede unduŋ yobu Judahidi indiŋ tubu-udaneeŋ niŋgiŋ, “Mumbe yo kagumun! Du adi Samaliyaniŋ me yabapnit!”
Kaŋ Jesudibo yoguk, “Nu yabapdi welene gineŋ mu hatak. Nu adi Batne niŋa tiloloŋ tilat kaŋ hidi nanintifo tiiŋ.
Nu na wotnene tiloloŋdok mu yolat. Nu wotnene yohautadok kwanai u me niŋ’walaŋ kaŋ adi mede yodapmaune folooŋnit hinek tilak.
Nu biyagoŋ hinek hanimbe nadineŋ. Nebek niŋdi nu’walaŋ mede kame hatilak adi kumuŋ mu tibaak.”
Unduŋ yobu Judahidi pilap hinek indiŋ niŋgiŋ, “Biyagoŋ hinek, da yabapgenit yoyam. Abalaham adi kumuŋ tuguk, eŋ polofet heki adi maaŋ kumuŋgiŋ, iŋgoŋ du nebek niŋdi medege kame hatilak adi kumuŋ mu tibaak yolaŋ.
Betnik Abalaham eŋ polofet heki adi loloŋhinit hinek iŋgoŋ kumuŋgiŋ. Kaŋ du dediŋ doktiŋa sigige kisaŋ hinek tilolaŋ?”
Unduŋ niŋgiŋ kaŋ Jesudibo indiŋ yeniŋguk, “Nu na sigine tilowene adi tuwot mu tibek. Batne hatilak, hidi Bepaŋhik yoiŋ, adikuyeŋ nanintilolak.
Hidi adi mu nadidakalemiiŋ iŋgoŋ nu adi agaŋ nadidakalemiŋa medeŋiŋ kame hatilat doktiŋa adi mu nadimilat yobit adi yalaŋ yoŋa hidi nabugoŋ tibit.
Tiŋa behik Abalaham adi nu’walaŋ mintaminta nai dulaune kakaŋdok nadifo wapum tiŋa hatiguk. Ala agaŋ folooŋ mintaune kaŋ nadifo tuguk.”
Unduŋ yoguk kaŋ Judame hekidi niŋgiŋ, “Du guletge 50 mu tuguk iŋgoŋ Abalaham deti kaguŋ yo yolaŋ.”
Ninadigiŋ kaŋ yoguk, “Nu biyagoŋ hinek hanimbe nadineŋ. Abalaham adi mu mintaaŋ hatigukneŋ nu koom hatigutdi hatilat.”
Unduŋ yobune kawade moŋgola utnim yo tubune Jesu Siloŋyotneniŋ wodimaaŋ fouguk.
Jesu adi unduŋ tiŋa talipmeŋ wooŋ me niŋ miŋ weleŋ maaneŋ dawi sipmakaŋ mintaguk u kaguk.
Kaŋ mihiŋiyedi ninadigiŋ, “Hinale, me i kadakaniŋ ne’walaŋdi be, be miŋbeu’walaŋdi tuguk kaŋ dawi sipmakaŋ mintaguk?”
Ninadigiŋ kaŋ adibo yeniŋguk, “U adi nebek niŋ’walaŋ kadakaniŋ doktiŋa mu mintaguk, hogok Bepaŋ’walaŋ saŋiniŋ u me dawi sipmakaŋ’walaŋ hatihatiŋiŋ gineŋ miŋgilaŋgoŋ mintadakaledok yoŋa unduŋ mintaguk.
Indi hadapmogoŋ me napmeu bugut’walaŋ kwanai tiyaneem. Tigene mambip tubune nebek niŋdi kwanai tuwot mu tibaakneŋ.
Nu kwetfoloŋ hatiliwene hautanedi metam kwetkwet hautahamulak.”
Unduŋ yoŋa maluluk kwetfoloŋ suwaaŋ miŋobune dagik tuguk kaŋ uŋakoŋ moŋgola me dausipmik dawi foloŋ hafiyeeŋ indiŋ niŋguk,
“Wooŋ Siloam imeŋgwaŋ gineŋ namandake youteleŋ.” Siloam u inde’walaŋ mede gineŋ “Niŋkut” yoyam. Kaŋ me u wooŋ namanda youtela daudiwediwe tuguk.
Unduŋ tiŋa udaneeŋ buune metam noliŋiye be nadimiŋ tagiŋ adi u kaŋ yogiŋ, “Me i faŋgoŋfaŋgoŋ kweliŋgoŋ ilaŋa nanaŋedok nayo tilak, u bidak?”
Yoŋa nolidi indiŋ yogiŋ, “Wa negoŋ.” Yogiŋ kaŋ nolidi yogiŋ, “Moŋ, me u adi nabugoŋ diwelak.” Kaŋ me weŋ nebo yoguk, “Nu nagoŋ.”
Unduŋ yobune ninadigiŋ, “Kaŋ dediŋ tiŋa du dauge tomuŋak?”
Ninadigiŋ kaŋ adibo yeniŋguk, “Me wou Jesu yoiŋ adi dagik youmiŋobuŋa moŋgola daune foloŋ hafiyeeŋ naniŋkulune wooŋ Siloam imeŋgwaŋ gineŋ namandatne youtelat. Kaŋ nai uŋaniŋgoŋ daune tomuŋak.”
Yeniŋguk kaŋ adibo ninadigiŋ, “Kaŋ me u daŋ hatak?” Ninadigiŋ kaŋ “Mu nadilat,” yeniŋguk.
Unduŋ tiŋa me dawi tombu diwediwe tuguk u nagila Falisi heki’walaŋ ugiŋ.
Jesudi me u Sabat foloŋ dawi tubutomiŋguk
doktiŋa Falisi hekidi indiŋ ninadigiŋ, “Du dediŋ tiŋa dauge tombu diwelaŋ?”
Ninadiune yeniŋguk, “Adi dagik moŋgola daune foloŋ hafiyeŋak kaŋ namandatne youtela daudiwediwe tilat.” Unduŋ yeniŋguk kaŋ Falisi nolidi yogiŋ, “Me u Yodoko Mede lahula Sabat foloŋ kwanai tilak doktiŋa adi Bepaŋ’walaaniŋ moŋ.” Kaŋ nolidi indiŋ yogiŋ, “Me kadakaniŋ titiŋdi kwanai undiniŋ u tuwot mu tibek.” Unduŋ yoŋa nehi uŋgoŋ siwe tigiŋ.
Tiŋa me u kotigoŋ indiŋ ninadigiŋ, “Du me u dauge tubutomuŋak aditok dediŋ nadilaŋ?” Ninadigiŋ kaŋ adibo yoguk, “Adi yadi polofet.”
Unduŋ yenimbune Judame talitimeŋ heki adi medeŋiŋ yalaŋ binek yolak yoŋa miŋbeu yenimbune buune indiŋ yeninadigiŋ,
“I hidi’walaŋ mihihik dausipmakaŋ mintaguk iŋakoŋ be? Kaŋ adi deti daudiwediwe tilak?”
Unduŋ yeninadigiŋ kaŋ miŋbeudibo yogumuk, “Me i indi mihinik dawi sipmakaŋ mintaguk u agaŋ nadiyamut,
iŋgoŋ dediŋ tiŋa daudiwediwe tilak be neeŋdi tubukedebaŋak u indi mu nadiyamut. Adi agaŋ bedinaditomulak ale ne kedem ninadi kaneŋ.”
Judame heki’walaŋ me wapuhidi yofafaŋe indiŋ tigiŋ, “Nebek niŋdi Jesudok Kilisto yobaak adi kayoŋbop gineniŋ yeniŋkelekutdok.” Unduŋ yogiŋ doktiŋa miŋbeu adi munta tiŋa ne niŋkakaŋdok yogumuk.
Unduŋ yogumuk kaŋ me dawi sipmakaŋ mintaguk u kotigoŋ kutinimbu buune niŋgiŋ, “Bepaŋ dawi gineŋ mede biyagoŋ yobeŋ. Indi me i kadakaniŋ titiŋ u agaŋ nadiyam kaŋ du dediŋ nadilaŋ?”
Niŋgiŋ kaŋ adibo yoguk, “Nu me u kadakaniŋ titiŋ be dediŋ u mu nadilat iŋgoŋ nu adi daune sipmakaŋ hatigutdi daudiwediwe tilat u adi agaŋ nadihinakalat.”
Yeniŋguk kaŋ kotigoŋ niŋgigineeŋ indiŋ ninadigiŋ, “Me u maŋgoŋ tiŋa gehitubu-kedebaŋak be dediŋ tigamuŋak kaŋ daudiwediwe tilaŋ?”
Niŋgiŋ kaŋ yeniŋguk, “Nu mede agaŋ haniŋat iŋgoŋ deti nadikabeleeŋ kotigoŋ hanimbit yoŋa naninadiiŋ? Be hidi maaŋ adi’walaŋ mihiŋiye mintane nadiiŋ? Be hidi maaŋ adi’walaŋ mihiŋiye mintane nadiiŋ?”
Unduŋ yenimbu adibo medehaki gibitaŋ niŋa indiŋ nintogiŋ, “Du yadi adi mihiŋiŋ kuyoŋ, eŋ indi adi Moses’walaŋ mihiŋiye.
Bepaŋ ne Mosesdok mede niŋguk u agaŋ nadiyam iŋgoŋ me i deŋandiŋ mintaaŋ buguk u indi mu nadiyam.”
Niŋgiŋ kaŋ me wondibo yeniŋguk, “Me daune tubutomuŋak adi deŋandiŋ mintaaŋ buguk u mu nadiiŋ doktiŋa nu nadihambe uŋgoniŋ hinek tilak.
Indi a nadiyam. Bepaŋ adi me kadakaniŋ titiŋ mu yehitubu-lodalak. Me nediyeŋ gikiŋgoŋ timiŋa maŋiŋ tagimneiŋ adi hogok yehitubu-lodalak.
Kunum kwet tububihit tugukneŋ nebek niŋdi me dausipmik mintaguk undiniŋ nemu tubukedebaguk nadiyam.
Unduŋ doktiŋa me i Bepaŋ’walaŋkade mu fowe tuguk binek adi kwanai indiniŋ tuwot mu tuluwek.”
Unduŋ yenimbu niŋgiŋ, “Du danile kadakaniŋ gimiŋgimiŋ uŋoŋ dibek mintaguŋdi indi-kube ninindidimewe tilaŋ?” Unduŋ niŋa silone tukukiŋ.
Unduŋ tigiŋ kaŋ Jesudi kahat u nadiŋa me daudiwediwe tuguk u tubumintaaŋ indiŋ ninadiguk, “Du Me Kobumuŋ nadisukilitimilaŋbe, be moŋ?”
Ninadiune yoguk, “Wapum, me u neeŋ ale, nanimbune kaŋ kedem nadisukilitimimbit.”
Yobune Jesudi indiŋ niŋguk, “Me u agaŋ kalaŋ eŋ dukut mede yonadi tamut nu iŋakoŋ.”
Yobune adibo niŋguk, “Wapum, nu agaŋ nadisukilitigamulat.” Yoŋa Jesu kayoŋ foloŋ mulelem timiŋa niutumbaguk.
Unduŋ tuguk kaŋ Jesudi metam indiŋ yeniŋguk, “Nu kwetfoloŋ iŋoŋ me mebihik tubudakalewe fogut doktiŋa me dausipmik heki adi daudiwediwe tineeŋ, kaŋ me dauhik kedehi adi dauhik sipmakahi tineeŋ.”
Unduŋ yobu Falisi noli uŋoŋ yakiŋ adi mede u nadiŋa indiŋ niŋgiŋ, “Indi daunik sipmakahi moŋ!”
Yogiŋ kaŋ Jesudibo yeniŋguk, “Hidi dausipmik hatiyaneŋ binek kadakaniŋ mu taneŋ, iŋgoŋ hidi dauhik kedem yoiŋ doktiŋa hidi kadakaniŋhinit.”
Tiŋa Jesudi mede noli indiŋ yeniŋguk, “Biyagoŋ hinek hanimbe nadineŋ, me dompa heki’walaŋ yeme gineŋ didimeniŋgoŋ mu fooŋ gimbahaŋ muloloŋ looŋ folak adi yadi kubome.
Eŋ me yeme gineŋ didimeŋgoŋ folak adi yadi dompa yabudoko me.
Ala me yeme kadokolak adi talik dilitomimbune fooŋ dompaŋiye wohiye kutiyenimbune maŋiŋ mede nadikiyondaaŋ keleeŋ fowiiŋ.
Maŋiŋ mede agaŋ nadikiyondaiŋ doktiŋa kutiyeniŋa koom uune mindaŋ keleiŋ.
Dompa heki adi me gitipmuŋ’walaŋ maŋiŋ mede mu nadikiyondaiŋ doktiŋa mede yenimbune momoŋ tinetiŋit.”
Jesu adi yoyout mede unduŋ yenimbune mu nadidakalegiŋ.
Mede u mu nadidakalegiŋ doktiŋa tomboyoula indiŋ yeniŋguk, “Biyagoŋ hinek hanimbe nadineŋ. Nu adi dompa heki’walaŋ yeme,
doktiŋa nu mu mintawe timeŋ mintaaŋ hatigiŋ adi yadi kubo tiŋa fana tigiŋ. Unduŋ tigiŋ doktiŋa dompa hekidi medehik mu nadigiŋ.
Tiŋa nu adi yeme doktiŋa nebek niŋdi nu’walaŋkade bulak adi kadaka mu tibaak. Adi yadi uŋambuŋat tiŋa nanaŋe duhuduhu momooŋ tubumintalak.
Kubome adi dompa kuboneeŋ yehitubu-kadakaaŋ widihikumuŋdok hogok yaulak. Iŋgoŋ nu adi dompa heki adi kulemaŋgoŋ hatibune hatihati fafaŋeniŋ tubumintayemdok yoŋa fogut.
“Nu adi dompa kadokome momooŋ. Dompa kadokome momooŋ adi indiniŋ: Adi hatihatiŋiŋ netok mu kahileeŋ dompa hekidok hogok nadilak.
Tipilapilaye me adi dompa molom moŋ. Unduŋ doktiŋa adi kamo moihi buune yabuŋa ne folooŋdok nadiŋa dompa heki biyabuŋa momoune kamo moihidi fooŋ dompa yehitubu-pupuheneeŋ noli yehisikumuŋa naiŋ.
Tipilapilaye me adi muneeŋdok hogok nadilak doktiŋa dompadok nadibedi mu tiŋa momoŋ tilak.
Baŋdi nu nadinamulak kaŋ nu Baŋ nadimilat undugoŋ dompaneyedi nu nadinamiiŋ kaŋ nu maaŋ adi nadiyemulat. Nu dompa kadokome momooŋ doktiŋa hatihatine aditok yemulat.
Tiŋa nu’walaŋ dompa noli gimbahaŋ gineŋ iŋgoŋ mu hatiiŋ u maaŋ yahaŋewe buŋa bopneeŋ medene nadineeŋ. Kaŋ dompadi bop kubugoŋ minta hatibune yabudoko me kubugoŋdi yabudokoluwaak.
“Nu hatihatine biŋa kotigoŋ kahilewaat doktiŋa Me Baŋ adi weleŋdi hinek nabukahile tilak.
Nebek niŋdi hatihatine u mu nolomtibaak, unduŋ titiŋdok u na nadiŋa tibaat. Hatihatine bibiŋdok be hatihatine tomboyoula hatidok wendok saŋiniŋ hatnamulak. Me Baŋdi unduŋ titiŋdok nanindapmaguk.”
Jesudi mede unduŋ yobune Judahi metam nehi uŋgoŋ siwe tigiŋ.
Tiŋa metam feedi indiŋ yogiŋ, “Me ya yabapdi fomimbune nadibubuye tiŋa mede undiniŋ yolak ale hidi dediŋ doktiŋa medeŋiŋ nadiiŋ?”
Unduŋ yogiŋ kaŋ metam nolidi indiŋ yogiŋ, “Me yabapnitdi mede indiniŋ kedembe yobek? Tiŋa undugoŋ me yabapnitdi dauhik sipmakahi deti yehitubu-tombek yo yoiŋ?”
Bepaŋ’walaŋ Siloŋyot kameheune yakuk u kotigoŋ dilitomuŋa kahaŋ tigiŋ diniŋ gulet tuguk.
Nai uŋaniŋ sububa nai tubune Jesu adi Siloŋyot gagayeŋ Solomon’walaŋ walanda yoyagiŋneŋ uŋoŋ uŋambuŋat tubune
Judame hekidi kelemadi yaliŋa niŋgiŋ, “Du dediŋ doktiŋa mebige kamehebiune welelufom kisaŋ hinek tam. Biyagoŋ hinek, du Kilisto nobu kaŋ didimeŋgoŋ-ku niniliŋ.”
Unduŋ niŋgiŋ kaŋ Jesudibo yeniŋguk, “Nu mede agaŋ koom haniŋgut iŋgoŋ hidi nu mu nadisukilitinamiiŋ. Nu kudi tilat woŋ adi Batne’walaŋ saŋiniŋ foloŋ tibe mebine uŋoŋ mintadakalelak
iŋgoŋ hidi nu’walaŋ dompa mu hatiiŋ doktiŋa mu nadisukilitinamiiŋ.
Nu’walaŋ dompaneye adi agaŋ nadiyemulat kaŋ adi maaŋ nu’walaŋ medene nadiŋa nehikeleiŋ
doktiŋa nu hatihati fafaŋeniŋ yembe kumuliwe mu tineeŋ, moŋ hinek. Tiŋa undugoŋ nebek niŋdi kohone gineniŋ tuwot mu nolommoŋgolaak.
Baŋ adi nemenemek hogohogok yalakapme-dapmaŋ tilakdi metam u namguk doktiŋa nebek niŋdi Batne’walaŋ kohoŋ gineniŋ tuwot mu kibidali moŋgolaak.
Eŋ nu tiŋa Baŋ indi kubugoŋ.”
Unduŋ yenimbune Judahi metamdi kotigoŋ kawade moŋgola kula utne tigiŋ kaŋ yeniŋguk,
“Nu Batnedi nehitubu-lodaune kudi mebimebi momooŋ hogok tibe kaiŋ. Iŋgoŋ hidi kudi deŋak kau kadakaune kawadedi nutne tiiŋ?”
Yenimbune yogiŋ, “Indi nemenemek momooŋ tilaŋ wondoktiŋa mu gutnetam. Du kwetfoloŋ medigoŋ Bepaŋ nintifo tiŋa da Bepaŋ yolaŋ wondoktiŋa gutnetam.”
Unduŋ niŋgiŋ kaŋ Jesudibo yeniŋguk, “Hidi hide’walaŋ Youkudip Mede gineŋ Bepaŋdi indiŋ yoguk kaŋ youkiŋ, ‘Indiŋ hanilat, “Hidi maaŋ bepaŋ.”’
Youkudip Mede gineŋ mede hatak u tuwot mu tubufitdok, kaŋ koom Bepaŋdi medeŋiŋ Judahidok yemiŋa nai uŋaniŋgoŋ ‘Hidi maaŋ bepaŋ’ yeniŋguk.
Unduŋ doktiŋa nu adi Baŋdi nehitubu-dakaleeŋ naniŋkulune kwetfoloŋ iŋoŋ fogut doktiŋa Bepaŋ’walaŋ mihiŋiŋ yolat kaŋ hidi dediŋ doktiŋa Bepaŋ nintifo tilat naniiŋ?
Nu kwanai tilat u kaune Batnedi kwanai namguk nabugoŋ tilat kaŋ hidi kedem nadisukilitinamneŋ. Eŋ moŋ nobu kaŋ, moŋ.
Be kaune Batnedi tilak nabugoŋ tilat kaŋ medenedok hogok moŋ, adi kudi tilat be kwanai tilat u kadakaleeŋ Baŋdi nukut hatilak be nu Baŋdut hatilat u nadidakaleneŋ.”
Unduŋ yobune kotigoŋ honeeŋ utnim yo tigiŋ kaŋ uŋgoŋ wodimaaŋ uguk.
Jesu adi unduŋ tiŋa momoŋ wooŋ Jodan ime fokolok, Jondi koom Imeyout kwanai hati tugukneŋ uŋgoŋ wooŋ itouguk.
Kaŋ metam feedi wooŋ kaŋ yogiŋ, “Jon Imeyoutme adi kudi nemu tuguk iŋgoŋ me yendok medeŋiŋ yoguk adi folooŋ mintalak.”
Unduŋ yoŋa metam fee kwet uŋoŋ ugiŋ adi nadisukilitimiŋgiŋ.
Heleniŋ Betani yokwet uŋoŋ me niŋ wou Lasalus adi yagit wapum tiŋa hakuk. Adi wiwiyat lufom Mata dut Maliya.
Maliya adi koom ime munduŋ momooŋnitdi Jesu kayoŋ yougomuŋa ki hapmuŋdi tubusilidamiŋguk.
Lasalus adi yagit wapum tiŋa hakuk doktiŋa wiwiyatdi Jesudok mede indiŋ kamegumuk, “Wapum, noke yagit tiŋa hatak.”
Mede unduŋ kamemimbune Jesu adi nadiŋa yoguk, “Yagit i mintalak adi kumuŋ folooŋ titiŋdok mokoŋ. Woŋadi Bepaŋ mihiŋiŋ’walaŋ mebi mintadakaleune metamdi kudi u kaŋ Bepaŋ nintiloneeŋdok mintalak.”
Jesu adi weleŋdi Lasalus hekiwit yabukahile hinek tuluguk
iŋgoŋ yagit diniŋ medenai u nadiŋa pilap mu uguk. Adi helebufa lufom uŋgoŋ hatiguk.
Hatiŋa mihiŋiye indiŋ yeniŋguk, “Kotigoŋ Judiya kwetneŋ unim.”
Unduŋ yenimbu mihiŋiyedi niŋgiŋ, “Hinale, sisa-kabe iŋgoŋ metam uŋahidi kawade moŋgola gutne tigiŋ kaŋ dediŋ doktiŋa kotigoŋ uŋoŋ uuŋdok yo yolaŋ?”
Niŋgiŋ kaŋ adibo yeniŋguk, “Hele kubugoŋ maaneŋ nai wapum hatak doktiŋa me niŋ adi hauta gineŋ hati yaulune nemek niŋdi tuwot mu youletik. Adi hauta gineŋ nemek kedem kadakalewetik.
Eŋ nebek niŋ adi timiŋ hautanit mokit uŋa kedem mauletik.”
Unduŋ yeniŋa tomboyoula indiŋ yeniŋguk, “Notnik Lasalus adi damo deitak iŋgoŋ nu wooŋ talamsukulewit.”
Yeniŋguk kaŋ mihiŋiye adi indiŋ yogiŋ, “Wapum, damo deitak u agaŋ kedem pilalek ale.”
Jesu adi kumuŋ tuguk wondok damo deitak yeniŋguk kaŋ mihiŋiye adi damo biyagoŋ binek deitak yo nadigiŋ.
Unduŋ doktiŋa Jesudi miŋgoŋ indiŋ yenindakaleguk, “Lasalus adi agaŋ kumuŋguk,
kaŋ nu uŋoŋ mu we kumuŋguk doktiŋa hiditok nadifo tilat. U hidi nadisukiliti folooŋ tineŋdok mintaŋak ale wooŋ kanim.”
Unduŋ yoguk kaŋ Tomas (wou niŋ Katap) adi mewoi noli indiŋ yeniŋguk, “Fiit! Indi wanaŋ wooŋ adut noŋgoŋ kumunim.”
Lasalus agaŋ weneŋ hatibune helebufa lufolufom dapmaune Jesudi Betani wosuwaguk.
Betani yokwet adi Jelusalem yamaiŋgoŋ
doktiŋa Judahi metam feedi wooŋ Mata yadeleŋŋit yehitubu-kilitiŋila hakiŋ.
Kaŋ Matadi Jesu talipmeŋ bulak yobu nadiŋa Maliya yopmaŋ uŋgoŋ bikabuŋa Jesu kawe uguk.
Wooŋ Jesu kaŋ niŋguk, “Wapum, du iŋgoŋ hale tuguŋ binek adi witne tuwot mu kumumbe tuguk.
Tiŋa nai indidegoŋ du agaŋ nadigamulat, doktiŋa du nemek niŋdok Bepaŋ ninadiwe tiŋaŋ kaŋ kedem gambetik.”
Unduŋ niŋguk kaŋ Jesudibo yoguk, “Wife kotigoŋ kaikaaŋ pilali hatibaak.”
Niŋguk kaŋ Matadibo yoguk, “Kougoŋ nai wapum foloŋ pilalaak u agaŋ nadilat.”
Unduŋ yoguk kaŋ Jesudibo niŋguk, “Pilapilat tiŋa hatihati u nagoŋ. Ale nebek niŋdi nu nadisukilitinamuŋa kumumbaak adi kumuŋ kabeleeŋ hatibaak,
eŋ nebek niŋdi kaipmuŋ hatiŋila nadisukilitinambaak adi kumuŋ mu tibaak. Du medene i nadisukilitilaŋ be dediŋ?”
